En revanche, le billet combiné pour voir les carrosses est excellent car les carrosses valent le détour.Audio guide en supplément.Temps de visite environ 45min.

title: On sunny days
text: Especially when the weather is nice, the palace and it's garden are worth a visit. The collection of portraits are the highlight of the exhibition.

title: Park
text: Wir haben Schloss Nymphenburg leicht mit U Bahn und Bus aus der Altstadt heraus erreicht. Das Parkgelände ist sehr schön und das Gebäude von außen sehr eindrucksvoll.Für den Eintritt ins Schloss haben wir 6 Euro pro Perdon bezahlt , allerdings etwas teuer für das was geboten wird. Daher unsere Empfehlung für die Residenz München statt dem Schloss.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: MUST SEE KING LUDWIG's 2 GORGEOUS GOLDEN CARRIAGES and SNOW SLEIGH
text: If you have NEVER seen a Palace, then you will ENJOY the Palace.  BUT ONLY The HUGE BALLROOM was GRAND.All the other rooms were very SIMPLE.PLEASE BUY THE TICKET to see the CARRIAGES.Most of them are PLAIN.  BUT at the END of all the carriages is KING LUDWIG's 2 GORGEOUS GOLDEN carriages and snow sleigh.   OVER- THE-TOP with GOLD on EVERY INCH of each carriage and snow sleigh and TWICE as LARGE as all the PREVIOUS kings' carriages.Buy the ticket to see the grounds and GOLDEN HUNTING LODGE.People were walking around enjoying a few ponds, a CEMENT gazebo, swans, and ducks,Go inside the HUNTING LODGE.  PINK on outside and you will be SHOCKED at EVERY ROOM inside HAVING LAVISH mouldings in GOLD and some in SILVER.  ABOUT 10 rooms in a building way out away from the Palace.  In those days, it was in a wooded area where they went to HUNT the DEER and such.It is LAVISH because the QUEEN liked to go and stay while the KING hunted.Plan to visit these grounds for HALF A DAY.

title: Wss für ein Stückchen Erde!
text: Ich beneide die Münchener.  Die können Tagelang in dieser Parkanlage spazieren,  Fahrrad fahren, rumliegen. Alles ist schön, der Wald, die Waldwege, die größten Apfelstrudel, wunderbarer Schloss. Und wenn die Sonne scheint, es ist Urlaub.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Monumental et lieu de naissance de Louis II de Bavière
text: Au détour d'un petit matin gris et pluvieux, on pénètre dans un grand cube architectural entouré d'ailes plutôt vastes.La galerie des beautés de Louis I de Bavière -le père de Louis II ?- est un ravissement. On se plait à imaginer le caractère de toutes ces femmes, leurs noms figurent en bas des cadres, un plongeon dans l'époque grâce à ces portraits.

title: Incredible Grounds
text: i wish we would have had time to go inside the Palace, but we were short on time so just wandered the grounds.  FYI--the grounds are free to look about.  Beautiful place!

title: Super 😍
text: This my visit was super the weather was perfect. Yes in this season has closed halls but we know that. Wonderful castle when i am again in München for sure i will back again.

title: obrovský zámek
text: krásně opravený zámek s rozlehlou upravenou zahradou. Stojí za návštěvu i bez prohlídky zámeckých místností

title: Schöner Park
text: Am heutigen Sonntag besuchte ich Nymphenburg. Insgesamt eine gepflegte und sehr schöne Anlage die unter anderen durch den Unterschied von Wasserflächen und Wegen lebt. Insgesamt lädt die Anlage zu spazieren ein. Ein großer Nachteil ist aber die Anreise. Es gibt viele Parkplätze direkt auf dem Gelände. Somit gibt es ein wenig Chaos zwischen Pkw und Fußgängern. Schlecht ist allerdings die Anreise mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. Auf der Homepage gibt es keine genauen Informationen. Es gibt auch keine klare Route von wichtigen Punkten wie z.B. dem Hauptbahnhof. Ist die richtige Tram gefunden ist auch noch ein Umstieg in einen Schienenersatzverkehr notwendig. Eigentlich kein Problem und dafür kann auch die Schlösserverwaltung nichts aber ein Hinweis und auch eine Ausschilderung wären toll. Vielleicht auch ein Shuttelservice? Gerade bei stark besuchten Touristenattraktionen ist es ein Gewinn für beide Seiten. Vielleicht mal bei dem großen vergleichbaren in Wien abkupfern. Bei nächsten Besuch in München werde ich mir auch das Schloss von innen anschauen.

title: Huge palace on a large piece of land
text: What an impressive palace on a huge piece of land. Room renovations had some wall coverings redone as late as 2014 so we’re very vibrant. Nice audio guide with good details. Very enjoyable.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Härlig park
text: Kanske inte i nivå med parker som Schönbrunn i Wien, men definitivt en underbart avslappnande parkanläggning med tyngdpunkt på skog och vatten snarare än blomsterarrangemang. Populärt område för Münchenbornas joggingturer och även för fågelskådare, som kunde ses släpande på stora teleobjektivförsedda kameror.Jag besökte personligen inte själva slottet och eftersom det var söndag var de kringliggande anläggningarna med bland annat keramikförsäljning stängda. Men parken definitivt att rekommendera. Synd att gärytorna - precis som varenda gräsmatta i München - är så totalt dominerad av mullvadshögar...

title: Schöne Grünflächen und Wasseanlagen
text: Das Schloss Nymphenburg eignet sich super zum Spazieren. Es ist beeindruckend das Schluss zusehen, aber auch grüne Botanik und angelegt Wasserspiele.Wenn man den Wegen folgt, kommt man zum botanischen Garten, aber auch zu anderen Sehenswürdigkeiten.Das einzige was ich zu bemängeln habe, ist das die ganzen Grasflächen voller Hügel war. Aber dafür kann das Schloss auch nichts dafür, das ist nun mal die Natur.

title: Must visit
text: A very nice royal residence / palace takes you back on the history, huge gardens, building structure. Gives a oversight of the palace and thoughtful process from ancient days. It has a nice souvenir shop which very good selection. Should be visited while in Munich

title: Extravagant
text: This palace isn't as good as the Palace of Versailles in Paris but it is still worth a visit. The gardens are very extensive and the interior does show the wealth of the aristocrats of the time.

title: Gorgeous!
text: We stopped here while on the HOHO bus.  It's in Munich city center, however, it's far removed from the other tourist spots so it was a worthwhile stop to us.  The magnificence of this palace is apparent once you approach it from the entrance.  Read that it's lots larger than Versailles & I can see why.  Great thing about this palace versus Versailles is that one may visit its grounds without having to pay any entry fee.  Once one enters the main building one is inside the lovely gift shop.  They offer a bit of everything from kitschy keychains to silk scarves and crystal objects.  Through the glass doors of the gift shop one sees the extensive gardens which are a must-see for sure.  The area really is even larger than at Versailles.  It is expansive!  The main garden is manicured and filled with flowers and statues as well as a lot of benches which is great for just sitting and contemplating as well as resting!Highly recommend if you cannot get out to see the other palaces (and castles) that Germany is famed for.

title: Beautiful palace and gardens
text: This palace which is on the out skirts of Munich is worth a visit and it is beautifully maintained.The gardens are beautiful to walk around.A must visit is the wonderful exhibition of carriages and slays.Nice selection of chinaware on display as well

title: Nymphenburg Porzellan Manufaktur
text: Grandios . Porzellan , hauchfein durchscheinend, Rokoko bis heute, Großes Theater bis zu weißem Gold - reduziert , als sei es Papier,... Porzellan zauberhaft, grotesk, galant, tätowiert... Design von Bustelli mit lockender Allüre bis Lagerfeld launig verkleidet ...

title: Beautiful, but I thought more area to see. Big garden
text: Beautiful palace, with a big garden to walk.Not so many rooms to visit like others, but it's nice.Carriage exhibition is nice, pottery one just so so (in my opinion)

title: Closed on Monday!
text: Schloss is still on Hop-On Tour bus on Monday even though the rooms and cafe/restaurnt are closed.  Gift shop is open.  Grounds are open.  Our walk around the grounds on sunny day was great. Beautiful. Restaurant nearby, past the Carriage Museum  - but watch for service times for lunch.   We were looking just for coffee/cake  -  which was available after lunch, 3pm onwards I believe.

title: Beautiful Palace!
text: We visited the Palace, and it was very beautiful in all the rooms!  We did not view the grounds as it was raining outside, but worth visiting and learning about King Ludwig!

title: Worth the visit but...
text: Lovely grounds. Quite happy that we visited but...website states fountains would be off mid October yet the were off already on October 8th. Website states buildings close at 1800 though several were closed before 1800. The main palace has a small area that you can walk through which is quite lovely and worth the time. The wooded grounds themselves are worth the walk to the other buildings in the complex. Certainly worth a go...just take note that you may need to plan to get there a bit earlier to avoid the buildings closing early on you.

title: Another Over-The-Top Palace!
text: Enormous by any standard (compares to Schoenbrunn, for example) with lavish gardens, a stream, forested land. Most of all the interior is a wonder in white and gold, crystal and woods, frescos/paintings; and a remarkable history to go with it all.  We were privy to only 10% of the palace. The Gallery of Beauties and the stories behind them is a key must-see.

title: Consigliata la visita
text: Bellissima residenza non molto lontano da Monaco e facilmente raggiungibile con la Metro fino a Laim e poi con un bus la cui fermata è proprio davanti al castello.  Abbiamo fatto la visita del palazzo ed è stata molto interessante e poi abbiamo camminato nei bellissimi giardini.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ferias
text: Achei lugar bom de passeio mas muito difícil estacionamento. Os jardins estavam apenas com grama ,não gostei muito e esperava mais do lugar . Valeu a pena para apenas conhecer
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Loved it
text: A great palace to visit with  beautiful rooms.  Caught public transport to get there, then had  a 15 minute walk but wasn't too difficult to find. Recommended.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Superb
text: The Palace is beautiful. I recommend the complete tour, with views of the various slices of life during those times.

title: Neat place
text: This was a super-neat palace to visit. The main room is amazing... just breathtaking. The Gallery of Beautifies is amusing. The Carriage museum (a separate, but cheap, ticket) is welllll worth it--I like the carriages almost better than the palace.

title: Хорошо
text: Норм большой сад!тира как петергофф,только без фонтанов)походить,подумать вдали от гороской суеты-самое оно!В октябре почему-то все водоёмы были полувысцшены!)

title: Was für ein Schloss...
text: ...inmitten einer weitläufigen Parkanlage. Ich muss zugeben uns war die historische Bedeutung und auch das Ausmass dieser Sehenswürdigkeit nicht bewusst war. Als wir dann Vorort gesehen haben wie gross und überwältigen das Schloss und vorallem die Parkanlage war, waren wir geplättet. Zu erreichen war das Schloss aus dem Zentrum Münchens direkt mit einem Tram, perfekt!

title: Riesen parkanlage zum spazieren.
text: Sehr schöner grosser park in dem man gut 2 stunden sich verweilen kann. Bei schönem wetter kann man in dem cafe/biergarten die zeit geniessen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Amazing Palace and Grounds
text: We took a U-Bahn and bus to Schloss Nymphenberg. The bus stops very close to the Palace, We bought the combination ticket for 11:50 Euros each. The rooms you visit are beautifully decorated and full of history and charm. The carriage and porcelain museums are fascinating. We spent several hours looking around the grounds and visiting the other buildings on the site. There is a free locker room for large bags and you only need to use them for your trip through the Palace rooms. Certainly worth a visit

title: Rococo Craziness
text: I almost gave this a pass and am so glad I actually went. This place is crazy. Most castles bore me - usually a lot of wow these people were rich, small, and not very good looking. These princes and electors, on the other hand, were really inventive with their conspicuous consumption. Get the full ticket - the outbuildings and carriage collection are much more interesting than the main building. I don't want to spoil the surprises - just go see how these nuts spent the seemingly unlimited taxes they collected from the Bavarian commoners.

title: Very cool place!!!
text: Fairly accessible by public transport (albeit a slight walk) and the gardens are beautiful. There is also a botanical garden that has an entry fee if you are interested. Plenty of benches along the park so a very nice place to have a snack or relax. Quite a few locals exercising through the park too. We saw some fish in the lakes and there is a gondola ride available too.

title: Nice castle
text: Nice castle and a beautiful garden. A great place to visit with your family or your friends. History is always fun...

title: Bellissima la sala degli specchi
text: Consiglio la visita con audio guida dove non solo sentirete la storia e la descrizione delle stanze ma vi faranno compagnia anche composizioni musicali dell’epoca. Non consiglio il biglietto con annessa visita dei giardini.

title: Solo esternamente
text: Bella la camminata che porta al castello, la stazione della metro è circa a 2.5km. Il castello da fuori è abbastanza bello, mentre internamente perde moltissimo, non conviene assolutamente entrare, nessuna delle sale è valevole di visita. Non ha il fascino degli altri castelli bavaresi e non regge il confronto con gli altri palazzi europei. Sì può saltare se so resta a Monaco per poco tempo.

title: Schloss
text: The Palace was quite a drive (traffic was terrible), but there was parking on site.  We purchased a ticket to see the palace and could walk around a number of rooms.  I should have gotten the headphones to know what I was seeing...it was kind of boring.  The gardens, however, were so beautiful.  There is no ticket required to walk through the estate...and one can walk for miles.  Very nice stroll through beautiful gardens.

title: Gardens were beautiful!
text: We only visited the gardens and the gift shop - we didn't pay to go into the palace itself. We could see into, though, and it looked beautiful. We walked all around the fountains, the waterway, into the forested area, and more. A beautiful walk with lots to see.

title: ΟΜΟΡΦΟ ΠΑΛΑΤΙ
text: Ομορφο παλατι κ μεσα κ οι εξωτερικοι χωροι. Απο τα λιγα μερη τυ Μοναχου που δε σε παει το μετρο αλλα παει τραμ . Εξαιρετικο το παλατι μεσα αλλα ακομη πιο ωραιοι οι κηποι του παλατιου για βολτα.Τιμη εισητηριου του παλατιου κανονικη.

title: NYMPHENBURGも良いですが、せつかく行くなら是非見て欲しい所、馬車の博物館！
text: NYMPHENBURGはWITLELSBACHの夏の宮殿です。広大な庭があり昔、貴族達が狩を楽しんだのが目に浮かびます。この宮殿が建設された理由が又 素晴らしいのです。当時の選帝侯Ferdinand Mariaが1664年に男の子の誕生を祝ってお妃におくつたプレゼント❣️ 世が世なら長男が生まれたら 宮殿と言うプレゼントが貰えた！そんな世に生まれたかつた。宮殿も良いけど、この宮殿の敷地の中には 素晴らしい馬車の博物館(Marstallmuseum)があります。それこそ目をみはるような絢爛豪華な馬車や橇、これこそ是非 見て頂きたい博物館です。

title: Bello
text: Molto belli sia esternamente che internamente gli appartamenti e il museo delle carrozze. Gli appartamenti sono davvero unici

title: A wonderful place to visit
text: Loved the little museum and the gardens.  We didn't have time to make it into the palace, but what we did get to see wonderful.

title: 早上來很好拍
text: 天氣好選早上來, 正好太陽曬在建築物上反射的倒影超美, 整個地方很大, 很適合當地人來這運動, 天鵝很多, 若是想要看城堡內部的話, 這邊就只是還好, 小了點.

title: lots of waterfowl and water - looking for European birds
text: A bit of a subway ride but, well worth the trip.  flowers and landscaping very nice, lots of open space.

title: Sooo Clean
text: I really had a good time here, I think everyone who goes via Munich can visit the place or go read a book in their peaceful gardens

title: Great small palace with gorgeous grounds!!!
text: This place is accessible by Tram or bike (park your bike outside because they are no allowed on the grounds).Walking along the canal to reach the palace is gorgeous and relaxing.There is a cafe there and there is no fee to access the grounds.

title: UM BELO PASSEIO!
text: Os belos jardins deste palácio, encantam o visitante logo ao chegar, pois os rios canalizados simetricamente chamam a atenção! Sem ter muito tempo para conhecer a área interna, ficamos nos jardins dos fundos, os quais guardam muita semelhança com Versalles, tanto pela aparência quanto pelo tamanho. Um passeio gostoso para uma tarde de sol!!!

title: Great visit
text: The palace is very beautiful, gardens are huge. If you want to visit them all, you need at least half day. Could get very hot when it is a sunny day. I got to see when the white swans were fed. Yes, many white swans there!

title: Palace to see
text: The palace itself and the gardens around is a must see place, if you like history is the right place to go.

title: Great palace great gardens, worth the tram journey
text: Great palace great gardens, worth the tram journey from the center of Munich. Plus is the gardens are free, keep off the grass, we got told off! Lol
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 漫享歷史文化
text: 要慢慢走⋯⋯這歷史是有地道德國味道的又融合了周圍文化的羅馬帝國時期特點，需要享受著去聽去看～～它的味道裡還能嗅到中國同期朝代的文化藝術，這不只是咖啡☕️出現的時髦，是東方文化的神秘侵入，有如鑽石鑲嵌著碧玉希望不可思議又神奇瑰麗！宮殿水係在那個時期設計算是大氣實用，連綿不斷雨季可見被放干的池塘⋯⋯

title: Nice walk through the garden
text: This palace is huge! It is definitely worth visiting. The garden is open for everyone, and you should definitely go for a walk there. The ticket for the palace itself is 6 Euro, and inside you can walk through 20 different rooms. You will have to purchase another ticket if you want to go through the museums in palace too.

title: Beautiful palace and gardens
text: We enjoyed touring the palace and museums.  The gardens and grounds were beautiful.  We bought the two week Bavarian Palace Pass here and then made use of it during our Bavarian travels.

title: Beautiful palace
text: A beautiful and large palate with an amazing garden in front of it wich is located near Munich. It has a fantastic atmosphere and I recomend it to everyone who visits Munich.

title: Beautiful art of the beauties
text: The exterior and garden were not spectacular. The interior and the paintings were beautiful. Over the top opulence of the Kings describes the furnishings,carriages cutleries etc. Room of the beauties paintings were interesting.Just a note- public excess is not so good as you still need to walk at least 1.5 km from the bus or tram stops.

title: Affascinante!
text: Un modo eccellente per passare una mezza giornata, se vi piace perdervi tra le stanze di un castello e osservare come potesse essere la vita al suo interno. Il complesso del castello include l'edificio centrale, il principale, così come altre piccole gemme sparse nel parco circostante (la più antica piscina coperta riscaldata, edifici arredati in stile cinese, sale meravigliose). È possibile visitare il parco gratuitamente e comprare l'ingresso alle singole stanze (più costoso). Se invece avete in programma di visitarle tutte, valgono decisamente il piccolo sovrapprezzo di €5-6 sul biglietto standard. Consiglio di andarci con il bel tempo in quanto, nonostante parecchio distanti le une dalle altre, sono all'interno di un bellissimo parco. Considerate almeno 3/4 ore per visitare il tutto con calma, di cui un'ora e mezza solo per l'edificio principale. Per quest'ultimo è possibile prendere un'audioguida per €3.50, a cui si possono attaccare due jack. Da notare, tuttavia, che all'interno sono presenti didascalie in italiano abbastanza esaustive. Negli altri edifici, le didascalie sono solo in inglese.N.B. Nell'edificio principale è vietato introdurre ogni tipo di zaino (anche minuscolo), ma è possibile usufruire di armadietti con chiave non custoditi.

title: A small castle with an amazing garden
text: This is a small castle about 30 minutes from Munich city center. You can visit it after you finish your sightseeing and shopping around Munich as it won’t take long time to see all the rooms of the castle. The garden is amazing and so relaxing.

title: Un château, trois musées, un grand parc
text: Proche du centre de Munich, le site est notamment accessible par le tram 16 ou 17 depuis la gare centrale.Le billet combiné permet de visiter certains appartements du château des princes électeurs de Bavière, le musée de la porcelaine, le musée des calèches et les nombreux bâtiments situés dans le vaste parc.

title: Whimsical!
text: Nymphenburg Palace is lovely from the outside, and the main room inside is probably the most beautiful room I've ever been in. It's so whimsical, light-filled, and colorful! There are also some gorgeous portraits of women throughout the palace, which were actually quite modern looking despite being almost 200 years old. The colors in this palace outdid any other palace I've seen in Germany.Outside the main building, there is a ton more to see. We saw the museum full of carriages, the porcelain collection, and walked to Amalienburg, a hunting lodge on the grounds (it looked like a palace itself haha!). We didn't realize that the grounds of Nymphenburg are so HUGE, there are other small buildings all around the property that we hadn't known were there, and we arrived a little later in the day so we didn't have time to see more than Amalienburg. Plan ahead to see more if you want, but wear good walking shoes because the property is massive and you'll do a few miles of walking if you want to see it all.

title: Very impressive
text: A visit to the Nymphenburg Palace is a nice experience. The visitors are captivated by the paintings on the ceilings, the furniture and artifacts in the rooms. A separate wing has impressive collection of  carriages and porcelain.

title: Beautiful and a must see.
text: The grounds and flowers are beautiful. Everything is well kept and the palace is amazing.  Plan to spend a couple of hours there to see and enjoy everything.

title: Great place to tour in Munich
text: A great place for a tour located in the center of Munich.  Perfect for a couple of hours and then hit some more spots in Munich.  Get the audio guide to help take it all in.

title: Conheci apenas o jardim
text: Estávamos em excursão e infelizmente não pudemos conhecer o palácio por dentro. Ficamos apenas no jardim, que é enorme. É bonito, sem dúvida. Mas não diria que é imperdível, uma vez que fica meio distante do centro. Mas se tiver oportunidade de conhecer o palácio por dentro, pelas fotos que vi, creio que valha a pena ir até lá.

title: Mooie gebouwen, mooie tuin.
text: Informatieve audio tour voor het paleis. Daar waren veel mensen dus soms lastig om goed te zien waar de uitleg over was en soms ook lastig te horen met andere audio tours in andere talen. In het park en de verschillende gebouwen in het park was het rustiger. Het park was een prettige plek tijdens een zeer warme dag. Goed bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer.

title: Beautiful!
text: Great scenery and beautiful gardens. A great area when the weather is nice & sunny. I really enjoyed learning of the history of this area.

title: Nymphenburg
text: Visited Nymphenburg as a student on holiday during the summer vacation of 1958 at Cambridge University. Retain warm memories of Nymphenburg.

title: Kings Palace
text: This place is located in the center of the city and it is really very scenic to visit this place. The entry fee for the palace is 6 Euros per person. The fountain and small lakes outside the palace are really very beautiful.

title: Vera meraviglia di Monaco
text: Una reggia bellissima poco fuori dal centro di Monaco di Baviera. Da visitare anche il parco e i piccoli edifici interni.

title: Ein toller Park der zum Wandern einlädt
text: Wer sich das Schloss Nymphenburg ansehen möchte, oder einfach nur Wandern möchte sollte hierher kommen. Es lohnt sich, man kann sich an diesem Park erfreuen.

title: Part of the Royalty from Bavaria.
text: Fantastic place. The swans in the lakes are indicative of the world of royalty ehibiyed in the Nymphenburg Palace

title: Gorgeous Palace and Beautiful Grounds
text: We really enjoyed the visit to Nymphenburg Palace and the impressive grounds.  The interior ceilings are high and tastefully painted with colorful scenes from the era.  Hanging chandeliers provide an accent that completes the elegant style of this enticing palace.  A stroll through the back gardens can entail a long walk.  Give yourself plenty of time to gaze and appreciate.

title: Complesso con grande parco
text: Interessante questo primo tentativo dei re (o elettori) bavaresi per arrivare alla più magnificenza del'Europa occidentale. Interessante la collezione di carrozze da parata.

title: Stunning Palace with Beautiful Grounds
text: Try at get there early to miss the tourist hoards, opens at 9am. Beautiful large palace with many rooms and full of history. The grounds are stunning well kept and I could have walked around for hours You do not have to do a tour, its much better to walk around on your own.

title: Beautiful.. Worth a visit!
text: Beautiful palace! Definitely worth a visit. My 5-year old girl loved the audio guided tour and was totally engaged (to my amazement!).... Fact that they allow you to take pics inside also is a bonus! The palace gardens are gorgeous. Complete it with a visit to and meal at the Hirschgarten which is a 20min walk from the palace. Good way to spend half a day!

title: It's OK but...
text: Lovely laid out grounds and stunningly over the top apartments with every spare panel painted with whatever would fit. Worth a visit, but was spoilt for me by  ridiculous rule. I had a backpack style handbag and i was refused entry until i put it in a locker. I tried to explain all my money etc. was in there bug no budging them, so had an uncomfortable visit carrying everything around in my pockets.And why? No explanations at all. I  couldn't have knocked anything over with it as everything was safely behind ropes,  and more to the point i could have taken a huge holdall round with me and no one would have raised an eyebrow. My small bag would have fit inside most of the shoulder bags other women were carrying. Ridiculous rule out me in a bad mood so didn't enjoy the visit as much as i should
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Prachtig
text: Mooie gebouwen, mooie tuin en unieke botanische tuinen. We hebben genoten van dit stuk historie. Het Versailles van Bayern

title: Da non perdere
text: Residenza ben tenuta, consigliato acquisto biglietto che consnte visita al museo ed al piano superiore.Molto ampio il giardino , pèassegguata comoda e quasi sempre ombreggiata; posto per ristoro al centro del parco non troppo affollato

title: Beautiful Property  - massive
text: You don't get to see the whole thing from inside - the overall size of the buildings and the layout of the property is very interesting.   Allow time to walk the entire property - you'll get lots of steps, enjoy the scenery, and work up an appetite.

title: Great day visit
text: Def. recommend this palace visit for a day away from the city. Beautiful gardens as well as botanical gardens. Would recommend the combi price ticket.

title: O Maravilhoso Jardim de Nymphenburg
text: Um dos pontos de parada do ônibus de sightseeing que fica apenas disponível no trajeto maior (completo) é exatamente em frete ao Castelo de Nymphenburg. A caminhada nos jardins atrás do castelo vai levar por volta de 1 hora mas vale a pena. Um lindo lago com peixes, patos e cisnes e fontes que são um cenário para belas fotos.

title: Прекрасный парк в центре
text: Красивый дворцово парковый комплекс в Мюнхене. Во дворце не был, оба раза просто гулял по парку. В каналах много самых разнообразных гусей и уток, нарядные павильоны. Прекрасное место для прогулок. Нужно закладывать на посещение не меньше полтора часов.

title: One of the better Munich sights...
text: We found some of the listed sights in Munich to be a bit underwhelming, after Salzburg and the Austrian Alps.  But Nymphenburg was good.  And we didn't even go inside.Good walks.  The approach along the canal is a good stroll.  Forests, river, lakes and the Botanic gardens on one side.Worth the effort and we thought it was better to stroll thru than the Englischer Garten.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Toll!
text: Wir sind ohne große Erwartungen am Abreisetag noch angehalten. Sensationelles Erlebnis!Die Anlage ist schlicht und ergreifend heute noch so umwerfend wie sie einst erdacht wurde.Spontan haben wir Tickets für das Hauptpalais erlöst und waren wiederum positiv überrascht - schöne Exponate, zugänglich präsentiert und dabei nicht bedeutungsschwer erklärt. Zudem faire Preise. Andere, große & berühmte Barockschlösser haben uns weniger überzeugen können!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Castello imperdibile
text: Ancora oggi di proprietà della famiglia Wittelsbach ma inserito nell’abbonamento di due settimane per visitare i castelli in Baviera è un palazzo meraviglioso. Aperta al pubblico la parte centrale e tutto il parco a cui bisogna dedicare del tempo per godersi le strutture all’interno ( ATTENZIONE se non avete l’abbonamento fate all’ingresso il biglietto intero perché le costruzioni nel parco sono da vedere assolutamente ) Caprioli liberi nel parco anatre paperi e cigni.....un luogo fiabesco.NON perdete il museo delle carrozze!!

title: Mooi van buiten, minder mooi van binnen
text: Een imposant kasteel om te zien. Het is ontzettend groot. De tuinen zijn schitterend en worden goed bijgehouden. Van binnen is het kasteel heel sober ingericht. We hebben de tour gedaan, zonder begeleiding, maar hebben het gezien. Er bestaan in Bayern mooiere kastelen om te bezoeken.

title: Incredibile
text: Tutto fantastico, sia esterni che interni. Parco bellissimo. Consiglio di fare il biglietto d ingresso a tutte le strutture (6) ne vale la pena. Alcune cose vi lasceranno a bocca spalancata! Superbo.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Immer einen Besuch wert
text: Sehr schöne Münchner Attraktion die jeder einmal in seinem Leben gesehen haben sollte. Wie so oft natürlich auch entsprechend voll. Trotzdem ein Besuch wert.

title: Fascinating
text: I’ve seen palaces all over Europe, but each one has its own story, of course, and thus can be interesting. This is a beautiful building, built for the Italian wife of one of the early Bavarian rulers, Ferdinand. The palace includes the carriage museum, with royal carriages which are unbelievably opulent. I didn’t have time for the gardens, but they are meant to be wonderful.

title: Absolutely beautiful
text: We walked a long way to get here and it was worth every step.  It amazing the work, the grounds and beautiful gardens.

title: Super schönes Schloss!
text: Man kann sich die Gärten des Schlosses kostenlos ansehen, um die Räumlichkeiten auszusehen muss man ein Ticket kaufen. Die Räume des Hauptgebäudes waren sehr schön und hatten eine gute Instandhaltung! Es gab überall Informationen zum Gebäude und den Menschen die dort gelebt haben. Es ist einen Besuch auf jeden Fall wert!

title: 広大で美しい庭園
text: ミュンヘン中央駅からトラム17番に乗って行けるとのことで、ホテルのフロントでも同じアドバイスでしたが、線路工事中のためのようで1駅手前のRomanplatzで折り返しとなり、私たちは知らずに周回している間そのまま乗っていましたが、運転手さんに聞き、バス17番に乗継ぎSchloss Nymphenburgまで行きました。朝9時の開館の少し前に行ったせいか、人も少なく、大変気持ちが良く、のんびりできました。ミュンヘン市内では珍しく日本語のオーディオガイドもあります。宮殿内も素晴らしいですが、市内のレジデンツの圧倒されるような内容に比べれば、公開されている部分は限られており、適度なものとも言えます。広大な庭園は時間がなくても少しだけでも踏み入れてみる価値があります。

title: Must see in Munich
text: Nymphenburg palace with its beautiful gardens is a must see in Munich. It is a Baroque palace and was the main summer residence of the rulers of Bavaria. One of the highlights for me was the bedroom where the famous King Ludwig 11 was born. King Ludwig 11, also know as the swan King or Mad king Ludwig - builder of Neuschwanstein castle.I also enjoyed seeing the gallery of beauties of King Ludwig1. The court painter painted 36 beautiful women of Munich. These were women of different classes. King Ludkwig 1 mistress is also included. There is a very nice gift shop at the entrance where you buy tickets. The beautiful gardens are also wonderful to walk around.

title: Great place to visit
text: The inside is awesome to tour through. But the highlight is the gardens. I wish we could have spent more time here, but it was raining and cold.

title: A pilgrimage of royal summer houses!
text: It was no stations of the cross, but you'd want to walk to every single house because each one is different.

title: Sehr schön
text: Mein Mann und ich waren übers Wochenende in München, da gehört das Schloss natürlich dazu. Es lohnt sich die München Card zu kaufen, man kann mit ihr für die gekaufte Stundenzahl alle öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel nutzen und bekommt unter anderem im Schloss eine Ermäßigung, hier 1 Euro. Haben für 48 Stunden 29 Euro für das Gruppenticket bezahlt, lohnt sich immer.Das Schloss ist wirklich sehr schön, muss man sich zumindest 1x bin innen und außen ansehen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful grounds
text: I explored the outside of the palace and the beautiful gardens.  Down a small street nearby, I also found a wonderful beer garden.

title: 天鵝堡前奏
text: 德國的堡壘多不勝數，參觀堡壘是必選景點吧。第一天來到慕尼黑，未去天鵝堡之前，我們便去了在市中心的寧芬堡宮，認識德國的帝皇歷史。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Gorgeous grounds and paths
text: Visited as part of a tour group. Beautiful palace and grounds. Try to budget some time to see everything.  Nicely maintained gardens.

title: Splendid building in the Munich suburbs
text: It is a massive house but only a small section is open to the public. It is not expensive and various tickets get you into various other elements. The “pavilions“ in the garden are worth a visit but would involve another 2 km of walking.If you can read English or German, you do not need to buy an audio guide as the audio only replicates what is on the information boards in each room. Most of that information is about the paintings and portraits in the rooms rather than the history of the house or its residents.We did not visit the Porcelain Museum or the Coach Museum.If you go by public transport there will be at least 1 km of walking to reach it from the bus stop.

title: History-art - gardens
text: This palace is easily accessible from Munich by tram and bus.  The approach is magnificent- scope, gardens, and water features. Tour is documented throughout- if we’d noticed the audio guides that would have been helpful.

title: Amazing - even in the rain!
text: We knew we were taking a bit of a risk with the weather but even so, we had a most enjoyable time. The extensive grounds were a delight to wander around and having bought a combined ticket we had entry to six different buildings on the site. We particularly liked the fact that English translations were available. At €9 each it was definitely money very well spent.

title: ヴィッテルスバッハ家の夏の離宮
text: 意外とオススメ。特に展示物が良かったです。美人画ギャラリーの美女たちは必見です。宮廷画家の腕が凄すぎて、実物をはるかに超える絶世の美女にしてくれていたみたいですね。それを知らずに見て、感動してました。。

title: Beautiful place
text: Recommended If you love palaces and gardens, history and art, And even without it, a beautiful place.

title: 中央駅から市電（トラム17番）に乗って簡単に行ける
text: 街の中心にあるレジデンツ（ミュンヘン王宮）は敷地も窮屈なサイズですが、このニュンヘンブルグ城は街から少しだけ離れた広大な敷地に作られているので、宮殿らしさを堪能することができます。ミュンヘンへ行ったら時間が都合出来る人は是非見ておくべき宮殿です。私は見て良かったです。中央駅からトラムの17番に乗れば乗り換えなしで行けます。初めは反対方向行きのトラム17番に乗ってしまい、近くにいた人に教えてもらって次の駅で逆方向に乗り換えし、無事にニュンヘンブルグ城の最寄り駅で降りました。トラムを降りてから７～８分ほど歩くと左手に宮殿が見えました。豪華な宮殿の中を見た後、馬車の博物館を見ました。豪華な馬車や馬具がたくさん展示されていて、馬好き、馬車好きの孫達は大喜びでした。室内を見学するよりも満足しました。午後、動物園へ行く時間を確保するために広い園内に点在する離宮を見ることができなかったのが少し心残りでした。まるまる半日（4時間）あるとしっかり宮殿を一通り見ることができると思います。

title: Riesige Parkanlage
text: Sommerresidenz in einer riesigen Parkanlage mit großen Wasserflächen und Waldgebieten, perfekt für einen ausgedehnten Spaziergang an heißen Sommertagen
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Além do Centro Histórico!
text: O Castelo de Nymphenburg, residência de verão dos Príncipes da Baviera, fica longe do Centro Histórico de Munique, mas há vários meios de transporte público que chegam até ele, principalmente em conexão com S-Bahn e ônibus. O salão da entrada é lindíssimo, mas o viajante se detém na famosa Galeria das Belezas, com paredes cobertas de pinturas das mulheres cuja beleza foi admirada pelo rei Luís I da Baviera. Mas, reserve um bom tempo para visitar os jardins, intermináveis, com surpresas que se escondem e se revelam..

title: prendetevi del tempo
text: Ci vuole un po' di tempo per visitarlo bene, un paio d'ore per la metà delle stanze con l'audioguida.Vale la pena, alcune sono spettacolari ed è comodissimo da raggiungere dalla città

title: so much history
text: I like going to places where you can immerse yourself in the past and walk where people walked 22 years ago. Beautiful park to walk through

title: Nice views , clean your eyes and fresh your mind
text: Very nice palace where you can spend couple of hours enjoying the historical Royal atmosphere .Excellent location for exceptional photos.

title: Visita que merece la pena
text: El exterior y los jardines son preciosos,al igual que todo el bosque que lo rodea. Si compras el tiquet completo la visita se puede alargar a más de 3 horas ya que se pueden visitar distintos edificios  que  están bastante distanciados.

title: Un site facile à atteindre depuis Munich (transports publics)
text: Comme d'autres personnes, je me suis contenté de visiter les jardins. Une balade très agréable et cela vaut la peine de prendre le billet pour visiter les pavillons (billet plus qu'abordable). Par contre il faut compter pas mal de temps car ils sont assez éloignés les uns des autres.

title: Nymphenburský palác
text: Krásný barokní zámek ze 17.století. Nemůžu si pomoct ale strašně mi to přípomínalo svou velikostí a vzhledem celkově Schönbrunn ve Vídní. Škoda jen, že nejbližší zastávka metra je asi 15-20 chůze, takže můžete využít tuto cestu nebo jiný druh MHD, který staví už přímo před ním.

title: Da Norimberga a Monaco.
text: Attraverso la linea S8 e scendendo alla fermata Laim si giunge in una bella zona residenziale. Uscendo dalla metropolitana e prendendo il bus 51 sul lato opposto dopo 6 fermate si giunge alla maestosa struttura residenziale estiva. Visitabili le stanze che la compongono dietro pagamento di ticket e con audio guida. Apprezzabile anche un bel e curato giardino ortobotanico.Gaetano e Cinzia28/31 2019.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Enorme
text: Anche se non abbiamo passato molto tempo x vedere l'interno, ci è bastata la visita dall'esterno x ammirare la maestosità di questo edificio ed il suo giardino

title: Residenza estiva reale
text: Una delle più belle residenze reali. Con belle stanze arredate è un ottimo parco antistante. Da vedere

title: 很美！但......
text: 相當美麗的造景與庭園博物館中也不賴有很多當地人會在當地運動不過庭院裡養了太多鵝、鴨庭園裡遍地的鳥大便，不敢架腳架拍照

title: Sehr sehenswertes Schloss
text: Wenn man sich gerne Schlösser anschaut dann gehört dieses auf jeden Fall zu den sehenswerten Exemplaren. Gut mit dem ÖPNV zu erreichen.

title: A walk in the castle
text: A lot of green and everything was like a fairytale. I recommend from my heart this lovely place, i was a couple of times, has great museum and nature.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Agréable visite
text: La visite du château, du musée des carrosses et du pavillon de chasse révèle un luxe incroyable et la balade dans le parc propose parterres de fleurs, cascades, canaux, sculptures, le tout est superbe.

title: Un tuffo nella storia
text: Il Castello è davvero spettacolare....non solo la visita nelle sale di una magnificenza incredibile ma una gita in mezzo ad un parco di una bellezza spettacolare. Abbiamo visitato il Castello ed il Parco e ci siamo tuffati nel passato. Anche la clemenza del tempo ci ha aiutato.

title: Spettacolare
text: È la residenza estiva della famiglia reale bavarese. È circondata da un bellissimo parco.Da visitare anche il museo delle carrozze reali.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sehr schönes Ausflugsziel
text: Haben den gesamten Vormittag dort verbracht.Der große Schlossgarten lädt zu ausgiebigen Spaziergängen ein. Hier kann man schöne Fotos machen. Auf den Alleen läuft man schön im Schatten.Für kleines Geld kann man das Schlpss besichtigen.Top: die zahlreichen kostenlosen Parkplätze.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Precioso
text: De lo mejor de Munich, el palacio es precioso y suntuoso. Se puede visitar por libre con audioguia en castellano. También se pueden visitar sus jardines, de gran extensión.

title: ミュンヘンに行ったなら
text: 非常に整備されていて美しい。ミュンヘン行った際には行きべきところの一つ。園内には、飲み物等を売っている場所がないため、園内を散策する際には事前に購入しておく方が良いかも。

title: Mesmarising
text: It is both massive, and beautiful!  And it is full of history, both of royalty and other stuffs, of lesser known types!

title: Nymphenburg Palace - must see palace
text: This is a self touring palace, with info in German and English.  Although it's enormous, the fee only gives you access to the portion that's directly behind the fountain. The main room is a LOT to take in, so take your time!  Additional fees are required to gain access to the buildings in the gardens, but t's worth the E5 fee to see just the palace.  You can walk the gardens for free, which are wild natural English style.  Very nice!  The gondola was there and available, but we chose not to do that either.

title: Nice half day trip
text: It is not the Palace of Versailles. But it is a nice spot to come for a half day, stroll through the grounds, admire the architecture, and soak in the atmosphere.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Настоящий дворец
text: Великолепный парк с каскадом прудов и каналов. Несколько музеев . Очень впечатлил музей где представлены королевские экипажи и кареты.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: nice park
text: The palace is nice but I enjoyed more the park and the surrundings. The gardens and the park are huge so get some comfortable shoes. One can also have a picnic in the park or just admire de view. we spent a very relaxing day

title: Un classico di pregio.
text: Ricalca lo stile di molte residenze reali del centro europa ma con le sue peculiarità. La residenza è ben curata così come il parco. Un escursione a portata di mano a poche fermate di tram dal centro di Monaco.

title: Qui nacque Ludovico II
text: Il castello si trova all'interno di Monaco. Il castello si suddivide in due parti: le stanze e il museo delle carrozze. Nel grande parco ci sono vari edifici. La stanza più importante è quella dove nacque Ludovico II.

title: Fantastico
text: Vale la visita.Sfarzoso, luminoso. Bello e unico il museo delle carrozze. Bello il parco e i suoi monumenti.

title: 絕佳慕尼黑景點
text: 雖然不如新天鵝堡有名，但是靠近慕尼黑市區、交通非常方便，而且裡面美輪美奐、可以拍照，講解不少關於巴伐利亞的歷史，後面的公園也很別緻，是名副其實的慕尼黑必去景點！

title: Castello da visitare
text: Castello facilmente raggiungibile anche con i mezzi pubblici Da visitare assolutamente Biglietto cumulativo 11,50€ - gratis per under18 Consiglio anche il noleggio audioguida (3,50€) disponibile in italiano Parco molto grande accessibile gratuitamente

title: Дворец Нимфенбург
text: Стоит найти время и посетить. Поражает своей роскошью. Интерьеры завораживают. Имеется пруд где даже зимой плавают утки. Обязателен к посещению, оно того стоит.

title: Incredible Place
text: Stopped from the bus tour, this place is huge and I think on a nice day you could spend hours here, I dont think there is anything like in anywhere in UK

title: La meraviglia a pochi passi da Monaco
text: A circa 15 minuti dalla città si trova questo meraviglioso palazzo che assomiglia per molti versi  alla reggia di Versailles.  Con un biglietto cumulativo di circa 11euro si possono visitare gli appartamenti ed i padiglioni esterni, come l'Amalienburg, all'interno del parco. Giardini meravigliosi, davvero ben curati.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un gioiello nascosto a Monaco
text: Ho visitato il castello nel giorno di ferragosto, il castello non è conosciuto quanto i più celebri di Fussen ma racchiude sale, decorazioni e opere meravigliose. All'interno di ogni sala sono presenti descrizioni in lingua tedesca, inglese e italiana. I giardini del castello e le fontane sono curati e risultano un piacere per gli occhi. Per la visita dei giardini, che sono molto grandi, consiglio di avvalersi di biciclette, in modo da poter scoprire altre bellezze nascoste.

title: Un vero polmone verde in città
text: A nostro parere una sosta obbligata a Monaco. Vale la pena visitare sia il castello che il museo delle carrozze come pure i padiglioni sparsi nel parco circostante che si fa apprezzare sia per la varietà di essenze sia per il sollievo che da in una giornata estiva.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Fantastic
text: My partner saw this on the internet as top 10 sights in Munich. Not at all disappointed. Superb in every way.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Expansive
text: Huge spacious grounds with a large garden and numerous paths perfect for a morning jog. Was never really crowded the whole time while I was there. Easy to reach by tram.

title: Im Vergleich zur Residenz enttäuschend
text: Das Schloss sieht von außen gewaltig aus, es stehen aber im Vergleich zur Residenz viel weniger Räume zur Besichtigung offen.

title: Joli moment en pleine verdure
text: Nous nous sommes contentées des extérieurs qui à eux seuls valent une visite.Attention : ne circulez pas dans le parc à vélo au risque d'avoir une amende....On ne rigole pas à Munich...

title: A faire si ciel bleu
text: Joli parc et beaux bâtiments. A regrouper avec une visite à ne pas manquer du jardin botanique qui est à 5 minutes.

title: Stupenda
text: Da vedere, questa residenza a pochi km dal centro di Monaco offre un parco bellissimo con un lago, an i mali allo stato libero, fontane ed altro o ancora che lo rendono unico.

title: What a sight!
text: We stopped in on a private city tour.  The palace was overwhelming in its beauty and size.  Only wished we had more time to explore the grounds!

title: The Small Buildings in the Garden are the Best
text: It costs 11.50 Euros to see everything and I strongly recommend making the effort to walk all around the gardens to see the various buildings such as the Pagodenburg, Amalienburg, Badenburg and Magdalenenklause.  Each one is very different and I enjoyed them more than the main palace which is typical overblown Baroque. These smaller buildings are only open during the summer months.  There is free parking for around 450 cars and the palace is a short walk from the end of the line for trams 16 and 17.  There is a cafe, but it's closed on Mondays.  If you want to have the place to yourself, go at 9am when they open and you will have almost 2hrs of uninterrupted photo opportunities.

title: Full of Interesting Things
text: The history of this place tells it all.  It's huge and takes some time to view most of it.  I particularly like the coaches and the sleds they used during that period.

title: Worth a visit!
text: Nymphenburg Palace is easily reachable by taking S-Bahn and alight at Laim Station, follow by Bus 51 or 151 to Schloss Nymphenburg. Before reaching the palace, you will pass-by a small lake inhabited with swans and ducks. It is a good viewpoint to take the palace and birds together. There isn't much tourists in this section and it is a perfect spot to take pictures without the crowds. The palace itself looks abit dull from the exterior. We didn't purchase tickets to go in as we are on budget trip. Instead, we walked through the palace to explore the free garden inside. Personally, I find the garden is not as beautiful as Schonbrunn Palace in Vienna but it still worth a visit.

title: B-A-utiful
text: Stunning place. We didn’t go in, just did the gardens (it’s free). In the beginning the rain was pouring down so there were hardly any people - so great photos. A must see in Münich. Would be nice with some public restrooms and a place to buy drinks and such, but that is nitpicking.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bellissimo
text: Questa residenza merita assolutamente una visita, gli interni sono particolari e gran parte dei mobili antichi sono in mostra. La stanza che più mi ha colpita è stata la prima quando si entra, il cui soffitto è decorato con degli affreschi. Prezzo un po’ troppo alto. Per il resto consigliata una visita

title: Парк!
text: Почти в центре. Лес, в котором водятся олени и грибы, а по дорожкам приятно пройтись даже в дождь. Вход в парк бесплатный.

title: 天気のいい日におすすめ
text: ミュンヘン中心地からトラムでアクセスできます。庭園が広くのんびりできるので、天気のいい日に訪れるのがおすすめ。

title: 別荘だけど豪華すぎ…
text: バイエルンのフェルディナント・マリア侯がアーデルハイト妃のために作らせたヴィッテルスバッハ家の夏の離宮だとか。トラムとバスを乗り継いで目の前に見えるのだけれどもなかなか近づけない…。広大すぎてあぜんとしてしまいます。宮殿を中心に礼拝堂や庭園が広がり、庭園内にもいくつかの建物が点在しています。敷地内には運河も流れており、ミュンヘン市街地から15分くらいしか離れていないとは思えないほど。池や噴水には白鳥を始め様々な鳥が集い、楽園のようでした。宮殿内はいきなりロココ調の装飾で埋め尽くされた祝賀広間に圧倒され幕を開ける。その後も両翼に品のよいインテリアと貴重な調度品がこれでもかと尽きることなく展示されています。庭園から森へと続いていきます。こちらはフリーで入れるのか、ランニングする人や犬の散歩をする人などを見かけました。なんと贅沢なことか。地図をみながら園内を回りましたが、案内表示もあるので迷わずに回ることができます。ゆっくりと歩きやすい靴で時間をかけて優雅なひとときを過ごしてください。

title: 방문필수
text: 메어타게스 티켓을 구입하여 궁전 내부는 물론 Marstallmuseum 까지 방문할 수 있어서 너무 좋았습니다.특히 황금 마차와 황금 썰매가 너무 웅장했습니다.

title: Nymphenburg
text: Schloss Nymphenburg ziet er op de plaatjes schitterend uit. In het echt valt het toch wat tegen, het slot is niet zo goed  onderhouden als andere kastelen die wij bezocht hebben. Dit geldt ook voor de parkburgen die in het park te bezoeken zijn.   Op de plattegrond van kasteel en park ontbreken de plekken waar je iets kunt eten en drinken. Een gemis vonden wij het ontbreken van een restaurant achter in het park.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lugar bonito
text: Bom passeio, jardim bonito e grandioso, interessante conhecer o estilo de vida da realeza, visitamos o museu e achamos ok. Os jardins são de graça o museu 6 euros.

title: Amazing
text: This location does not get too busy with tourists during the day in the week so it is perfect to explore at a leisurely pace. The grounds and decor are absolutely beautiful, with the building having a lovely large exterior which makes for excellent photos. There are ponds with ducks and geese which allow for a relaxing connection to nature. The gardens around the palace are beautiful too and are perfect for picnics or reading, or for a long walk with the family.

title: Beautiful Palace-Free to tour the grounds!
text: We didn't go inside and do the tour but enjoyed strolling the grounds and love that you can up on the terrace of the palace and take photos like you are the King. The gardens and grounds are not as grand as Versailles or Schonbrunn, but very nice nonetheless. We love that the gardens of the palace here and at Schonbrunn were free to wander through even if you didn't buy a ticket to tour the palace.

title: A sunny day!!!
text: Beautiful place and a lovely place, you can spend your all day there with the kids and your family. You can also visit and the Botanical garden.

title: Beau château à ne pas manquer
text: A faire en banlieue de Munich. Accès transports facile. Un beau voyage dans l’histoire. De nombreuses pièces meublées à visiter. Beau parc

title: Оно того стоит
text: При минимуме времени в Мюнхене обязательно сходите  ...почти в центре и чрезвычайно красиво.. сувериры тут же на первом этаже..

title: Toller gepflegte Parkanlage mit Schloss
text: Ein Besuch sollte hier schon sein. Riesengroße Park Anlage und sehr gepflegt. Auch für Kinder ist das hier gut geeignet. das Schloss ist auch sehr gepflegt und kann teilweise besichtigt werden.

title: Enormous palace with ditto gardens
text: This reminds me of Schönbrunn Palace in Vienna. Huge complex and awe inspiring gardens. Perfect to visit by bike, although you can't use the bike on the terrain. It's located a bit outside the center. If you like impressive architecture and gardens; must visit!

title: A truly stunning and huge palace well worth a visit
text: This enormous palace has many beautifully decorated rooms on display with many frescoes, and paintings plus furniture of the period.  There are two huge gardens - one very formal, the other heavily vegetated like a botanical garen.

title: Prachtig Paleis
text: Met de bus vanuit München hier naar toe gegaan. De bus stopt voor het terrein. De 4 kasteeltjes op het terrein zijn zeker de moeite waard.Je wandelt  door de prachtige tuinen. Sommige gidsen in de buiten paleisjes zijn bereid je nog wat achtergond info te geven. Het kasteeltje met het 1ste Europese zwembad is heel bijzonder. Het rosé kasteeltje is ook erg mooi, speciaal voor de jacht gemaakt met hondenhokken bij de entree. Het paleis zelf is indrukwekkend. Je kijkt je ogen uit. Neem in ieder geval een headset.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Versailles as you would like it to be.
text: Of course, This is a Bavarian copy/variation of Versailles. But in  that way you would like to encounter Versailles, without all the tourist masses and much more relaxed.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Trip Highlight
text: Absolutely loved this visit. We went first thing in the morning on a Monday. It was slightly rainy and we walked over from our hotel (Hotel Laimer Hof - reviewed it as well). My husband bought the combo ticket which we did not need. We really only had time to see the Schloss and the Marstallmuseum (Carriage Museum). All backpacks must go into a free locker - so know that.We paid also for an audio tour (my husband listened and summed it up for me). I was just so overwhelmed by the visuals I didn't want to listen to the audio - I just wanted to take it all in. Beautiful and worth the visit. The carriage museum was a surprise. I wasn't sure I would be that into it - but it showcased absolutely stunning carriages and sleighs. Do not pass this up. Highlights truly royal transportation.

title: Incontournable - Très belle collection de carrosses
text: La visite du château en elle même est intéressante, quelques belles pieces richement décorées et surtout la collection de beauté de Louis 1er de Bavière. La ballade dans le parc est agréable également, notamment le PAGODENBURG. Mais j’ai surtout préféré la collection des carrosses et traîneaux surtout ceux de Louis II tellement baroque

title: Стоит посетить однозначно
text: Дворец Нимфенбург понравился больше, чем Резиденция в Мюнхене. Много помещений сохранились или были воссозданы заново. Каменная зала с фресками просто потрясающая. Так же как и каретный музей. От такого великолепия даже глазам больно!:) невозможно представить, что люди на этих каретах или санях действительно передвигались, настолько они невероятные! Ну и конечно же, знаменитая «галерея красавиц»-то, зачем мы туда и ехали!Обязательно к посещению с детьми! На территории каскад прудов, даже в марте там плавали утки и лебеди, летом, я думаю, очень красиво!

title: 님펜부르크 궁전
text: 넓어서 정원을 다 둘러보는 것은 무리다. 크게 화려하지는 않아도 충분히 예뻤고 여유를 가지고 산책하기에 좋았다. 촉박하게 둘러볼 곳은 아니다.

title: De la ferme au château
text: Cette ancienne ferme, agrandie au fil des années pour finalement aboutir à ce grand château, est excentrée mais on y accède malgré tout par les transports en commun. L'intérieur, au prix tout à fait raisonnable, est à visiter sans hésitation et le parc est l'endroit idéal pour passer une très bonne demi-journée. À ne pas rater si l'on est à Munich !

title: Delightful place to wander
text: Nymphenburg Palace was a delightful place to visit. The grounds are extensive and pleasant to wander around. It is easy to get to by public transport although I recommend getting there early if you wish to take photos of the gardens unimpeded by tourist hordes. (The gardens open at 6am, the palaces at 9am.) The palace itself is small but quite elegant. There are numerous smaller buildings spread around the gardens and these can be entered also with the right ticket. There are fountains, lakes, temples and statues in the garden. Deer wander through the grounds as well. A gondola ride is possible on the central canal.Photos can be taken inside the palace. Tripods are not allowed.

title: Grandioso
text: Palácio grandioso muito conservado!Tirei fotos que parecem pinturas!Vale a pena ir para conhecer...

title: A must
text: More than anything else, this is the place to go in Munich. I suggest to take the full ticket and visit the central palace and all 4 dependances walking around the gardens area. It's a soul refreshing tour

title: Приятное место для прогулок
text: Этот дворцовый комплекс, поражающий своей роскошью, красотой и мастерством исполнения, по праву считается главной достопримечательностью Мюнхена.Дворец красив,особенно центральный фасад.В пруду плавают лебеди.Парк огромный.Там можно бродить целый день.

title: IMPRESIONANTE PALACIO Y JARDINES
text: Quizás lo más impresionante  es el conjunto,el jardin,los lagos,el edificio principal,la colección de carruajes y trineos...merce la pena echar 3 horas  en visitar lo más importante

title: Очень приятный отдых на целый день
text: Увеселитеьная резиденция Виттельсбахов - это дворец и большой парк с небольшими павильонами - интересными сооружениями. Во дворце аудиогид за отдельную плату...если владеете немного английским, то вполне можно обойтись чтением информации, которая есть в каждой комнате. Осмотрев дворец, выходите в парк. Ухожена только небольшая часть парка непосредственно позади дворца...дальше  - как в лесу...кругом вода, озерца,  утки, гуси, лебеди...Интересно гулять по территории и находить маленькие дворцы...Если стать спиной ко дворцу, то справа и слева от центральной аллеи будет по 2 павильона. Сначала пойдите направо...Пагоденбург и келью Магдалины легко найти (есть указатели), внутри их тоже интересно посмотреть. Слева - Амалиенбург (превосходный охотничий домик, восхитительные зеркальные залы!) и Баденбург (изысканная баня возле большого озера, не так просто найти, тут почему-то проблема с указателями...), а также Моноптерос (беседка), увидите, когда дойдёте до Баденбурга. В целом,  это превосходное развлечение: гуляя по тенистой, прохладной территории, обнаруживать что-то интересное...В таких прогулках по дворцу,  парку вполне можно провести достаточно много времени...А еще есть превосходный музей карет и саней...очень интересно! В целом,  очень напоминает Шенбрунн (для тех, кто был в Вене),  просто немного скромнее. Однозначно место приятное и интересное!

title: Immancabile visita al castello ed al parco
text: Vado spesso a Monaco a trovare mio figlio e tutte le volte non posso mancare una visita al castello. Aiuole di fiori davanti ed all'interno. Una vista stupenda ti riporta in quegli anni dove i regnanti si concedevano questi lussiosi posti.Non mancate una visita.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Tysk 1700-tal i kubik
text: Man slås av av starkt det franska inflytandet var i Europa på 1700-talet.Här på slottet möts du av all den prakt som det franska modet gnistrade av på 1700. Det är egentligen inte så imponerande förutom rummet med skönheter. Ett helt rum fullt med kvinnoporträtt. Det enda i världen mig veterligen. Garanterat det enda från 1700-talet. Det är värt att se och förundras över.

title: Excellant
text: Brilliant!  loved it all , inside and outside , carriages, ceramics, pavilions, lakes, woods, church etc ... lots of walking and really beautiful !
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Good day trip from Munich
text: We were staying in Hotel Eder near the main station, so took the 16 or 17 tram to Romansplatz and it's then a 15 minute easy walk to the palace. You can buy a ticket from the tram on the platform at Karlsplatz, it's still in the inner-area, and a group day ticket ( gruppen tageskarte) is 12.80 for 2 adults and up to 4 kids, so great value!! Entry to the castle and all the pavilions on the garden is 11.50 per adult and under-18s are free, so another bargain.The wall-painting and frescoes in the palace are worth a look, but for us we really liked the grounds and the pavilions, topped off with some beer at the cafe!We bought sandwiches before we traveled, but you could use the cafe or there's a supermarket near Romansplatz.

title: Nice gardens and interesting residence of the Kings of Bavaria
text: we loved the visit. The castle has parking in front of its premises. It is not empty, but not as crowded as some attractions. The collection of portraits is impressive, some art work related to the building itself is curious. The garden is nice. Overall a place worth visiting if you are in Munich

title: Beautiful palace
text: The palace was enormous and very beautiful, but I am a little bit disappointed because the gardens around weren't maintained properly.

title: Zámok Nymphenburg / Nymphenburg  Palace / Schloss Nymphenburg / Palacio de Nymphenburg
text: Ak ste v Mníchove iba na krátko, tento zámok nie je natoľko ohromujúci, aby ste ho museli zaradiť do svojho itinerára. Sprístupnené je iba jedno poschodie, pekné, ale zas ani žiaden zázrak. Areál zámku a priľahlý park je však výborným miestom na prechádzku.If you stay in Munich only for a while, this castle is not that impressive so that you have to add it to your list. Only one floor is accessible, nice, but nothing extraordinary. Hovewer, the palace gardens are a great place for a walk.Wenn Sie nur für kurze Zeit in München sind, ist dieses Schloss nicht so erstaunend, dass Sie es zu Ihrer Liste hinzufügen müssen. Nur eine Etage ist zugänglich, schön, aber auch nicht außergewöhnlich. Der Schlosspark ist jedoch ein toller Ort für einen Spaziergang.Si estás en Múnich solo un par de días, este castillo no es tan impresionante como para añadirlo a tu lista. Solo una planta es accesible, bonita, pero nada extraordinario. Sin embargo, el parque de palacio es un buen lugar para dar un paseo.

title: Wunderschön zum spazieren
text: Vorweg sollte man am besten zu einer ruhigeren Zeit hingehen. Also nicht unbedingt am WE, denn dann sieht man zig Touristen mit Bussen oder große Reisegruppen aus Fernost. Parken ist vorm Schloß gratis möglich. (Wenn Platz ist) Wenn man durch die Schloßmauern spaziert ist, gelangt man in den Parkt, der sehr groß und weitläufig ist. Einfach los spazieren und die Natur wirken lassen, überall ist was anderes zu sehen/entdecken.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Csoda!
text: II. Lajos bajor király egyik kastélya a sok közül, eben született. Kijjebb van a belvárosból, de villamossal hamar elérhető, valamint a hop on hop off buszok is megállnak itt. Óriási kastély, hatalmas elő- és hátsó parkkal, benne étteremmel. Bejárni nem kis séta, de nagyon megéri Egyik terme szebb, mint a másik, fényűzően gazdag berendezéssel, bútorokkal, csillárokkal, arannyal, porcelánokkal stb. stb. Kifelé muszáj valami emléket venni a nagy ajándékboltban. Kihagyhatatlan látnivaló.

title: Schloss zum verweilen
text: Ein sehr schönes  Schloss in München mit einen schönen großen Park. Wir auch gern besucht für Fotos von Hochzeiten. Im hinteren Bereich kann man sehr Ruhe Spazieren gehen.

title: It is a majestic palace,where spirits soar
text: Though it looked a  bit stark from a distance but once one enters the Nymphenburg palace grounds it is altogether a  different experience. Majestic lawns and fountains, with flora a and fauna, makes the spirits soar. Not to be missed for anything else in Miunich!

title: Impressive ceiling decorations
text: This is just one of the numerous buildings you can visit in the area although this is by far the most impressive. On entering you go straight into a very large room with the most impressive ceiling painting I have ever seen. Surrounding rooms are highly decorated too, again with impressive decoration on the ceilings. Be sure to walk around the extensive gardens at rear of Palace. There are numerous lakes and smaller structures to be viewed.

title: Gondel Nymphenburg
text: Das Schloss und der Park sind immer einen Besuch wert. Aber mein Toptipp ist die Gondelfahrt, die man auf dem Kanal des Schlosses machen kann. Ein unvergessliches Erlebnis!

title: Impressive site
text: Vast circular palace and buildings surrounding man-made lakes, fountain and gardens.  Well worth a visit.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bedre end Versailles
text: Stort og imponerende slot med en gigantisk slotspark. Stort og imponerende som Versailles. Kom tidligt for at undgå for mange mennesker, selvom det aldrig bliver så galt som den franske pendant.

title: Eskiye yolculuk
text: Dışarıdan normal bir bina gibi görünsede içerisi tam bir saray, sarayı kısım kısım gezebiliyorsunuz. Tümünü gezmek için en az 2 saatinizi ayırmanız lazım. Tümünü gezmek 11,5 € sadece ana binayı gezmek için 6 € veriyorsunuz. Ana binadan sonra küçük küçük binalar var ama bunlar 1rer  km uzaklıkta dağılmış durumda. Yürümeyi sevmeniz lazım. Bu arada sarayın bahçesinde yürüyorsunuz ve hem o mis havayı hemde yeşilin tadını çıkarabilirsiniz.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great palace to see if you don’t want to stray too far from the city center
text: This palace is a must see if you can’t stray too far from Munich center but want to see how the Bavarian royalty lived. Beautiful murals on the ceilings and lavish interiors. I especially liked the Kings portrait gallery of the country’s top 30 beautiful women. Quite interesting to see that era’s interpretation of feminine elegance and beauty.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Belo é fácil de chegar
text: O castelo conta com um lindo jardim muito bem cuidado, cuja visita é gratuita. O local é facilmente acessível por bonde, ficando a aproximadamente 20 minutos da Hauptbahnhof (estação central de Munique). Definitivamente vale a visita.

title: Spend a day here
text: The interior tour is interesting and so so pretty, but don’t miss the additional buildings like the hunting house, little chapel, and carriage/sleigh display.  The best part are the grounds.  There is so much space, designed to perfection. Leave time to explore everything and wear comfortable shoes.  Note:  in the summer the interiors are very stuffy and hot.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beau palais
text: Un très joli palais, un peu à l'extérieur de Münich.Le temps étant orageux et les averses soudaines, nous avons opté pour la visite du château et nous sommes promenés ensuite dans le parc (sans aller jusqu'aux différents pavillons).Très belles salles.

title: nice summer palace
text: After just visiting the Residenz in Munich yesterday, the Nymphenburg Palace's interior is not as extensive.  A visitor can walk through 13 rooms at the Nymphenburg and 90 rooms at the Residenz.  A highlight of Nymphenburg, though, is the Grand Hall, which has the only rainbow mural that I have ever seen in a palace.  There were lovely swans swimming in the fountains in the garden.  We were able to utilize our 14 day Mehrtagesticket to get into this palace.  For 26 Euros for one adult or 48 Euros for a family, you can visit over 40 castles/palaces in a 14 day period.  The garden at Nymphenburg was not quite as colorful as the Weikersheim Palace.

title: Realeza versallesco
text: Es un palacio en el que nació Luis II de Baviera, el "rey loco". Tiene jardines alrededor, museo de carrozas, el palacio Amalienborg, la pagoda, la ermita de Maria Magdalena, lago,... Merece la pena acercarse.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nice palace and gardens
text: The museum and grounds are very nice.Getting there is a little tricky since the palace is located on the outskirts of Munich, and you would need to walk from the tram station.You would see a huge palace and the pond with swans. The three-story Stone Hall is impressive. Don't forget to visit royal carriage museum as well. Unfortunately this museum does not have A/C so summer visits may be uncomfortable.

title: A must visit
text: The Palace and Carriage House are beautiful.  It is steeped in history.  Leave yourself plenty of time.  Lots to see
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Fazla ihtişamı olmayan sade bir saray
text: Dışı sade bir yapı ek binalrın bağlantıları ilgi çekici. İçi biraz daha gösterişli ama alışıla geldik saraylardan küçük. Hava güzelse bahçenin sonuna kadar yürümenizi öneririm.Kayifli bir yürüyüş olacaktır.

title: Beautiful grounds, lots of places to walk, not crowded on a Saturday
text: Walked the park and looked at the pond and outer buildings, enjoyed a sunny day in the greenery, there weren't a lot of people, which is nice.  Go to enjoy the scenery, quiet and get some exercise.

title: Riesig
text: Es gleicht einem Marathon die komplette Fläche des Grundstückes abzulaufen. Riesengroß und vor allem sehr schön und prunkvoll dort. Wir haben uns auch das Museum vor Ort angeguckt, für das ich als Student Rabatt bekam. Mit einem Schülerausweis kommt man sogar komplett gratis rein. Egal ob man die tolle Anlage für Fotos nutzt oder das Schloss von innen anguckt, alles in allem ein Aufenthalt wert.

title: Stupendo...
text: Assolutamente consigliata la visita sia del parco ( che è gratuita) che dell'interno del castello in tutte le sue parti.Deposito zaini e guardaroba gratuiti, servizi puliti. Personale gentile. Una tappa è d'obbligo!

title: Munchen 🇩🇪
text: In Munchen this is one of my favorite attraction. The palaces are wonderful, also the park is fantastic. With the children is a perfect area for relax.

title: Visite à prévoir lors de votre séjour à Munich
text: Nous avons passé un très bel après-midi dans ce lieu majestueux. Avons apprécié l'intérieur du château et la promenade dans le parc ombragé qui complète bien la visite. Possibilité de se garer gratuitement à proximité.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A pleasant half day
text: I enjoyed a pleasant walk checking out the grounds of Nymphenburg Palace. Unfortunately no time to check out the pavilions or the inside of the palace, but I really enjoyed the Carriage and Porcelain museum - I'm glad I went in, after 4 weeks in Europe is was fun to see a different type of museum! Its a decent and unappealing walk from public transport (and other websites didn't provide great navigation instructions so Google was certainly necessary) but once inside the grounds it was like being in a different world - just lovely. The further into the grounds you get, the further you get away from the tourist hordes which is also nice. I ended up spending a few hours here

title: Great Palace
text: The sledge collection is worth the visit just for them.  Albeit, there are carriages that were used by the German Royal Families.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Отличное место для прогулок.
text: Сюда действительно, стоит приехать! Есть где погулять: большой парк (почти лес), много водоемов (ручьев, прудов, озер). Фонтаны, конечно, не дотягивают до Петергофа, но тут уж ничего не поделать! Бюджеты были разные! :)) Есть что посмотреть. Дворец шикарен, просторен, но не утомляет. Помимо дворца по территории разбросаны другие здания, которые весьма интересны, хотя и не занимают много времени на осмотр. Повторюсь, для неспешной прогулки очень подходящее место.

title: Sehr schön
text: Einfach schön und gemütlich zum Entspannen und spazieren gehen, einen Sehewürdigkeit fie muss man gesehen haben.

title: wunderschöner Ausflug zum Schloss
text: Im Zuge der Stadtrundfahrt waern wir auch im Schloss Nymphenburg.  war auf jeden Fall eine Besuch wert.

title: Nice to see, but not a must see
text: The palace grounds are a very nice park with some of the palace structures setup for viewing. Access to the structures is somewhat limited, as not a lot of the rooms of the main palace can be viewed, but there is a fair amount of content to see if you visit all 5-6 structures on the combination ticket. Дворец Нимфенбург –  один из самых больших дворцовых комплексов Европы.  Центральное здание  построили  в барочном стиле в 1674 году, архитектор - Агустино Барелло,  а далее следующие поколения династии баварских герцогов Виттельсбахов  постоянно достраивали замок.        Площадь огромного парка при дворце составляет 200 гектаров. А погулять по парку стоит. он нам понравился больше Версальского парка в Париже. Это отличное место для прогулок и отдыха с его озерами и каналами, на поверхности которых летом плавают восхитительные лебеди. Большое количество беседок и оранжерей. То место в Мюнхене, в котором нужно побывать обязательно!

title: Nymphenburg Palace Visit
text: .The Nymphenburg Palace (German: Schloss Nymphenburg), i. e., "Castle of the Nymph (or Nymphs)", is a Baroque palace in Munich, Bavaria, southern Germany.The Nymphenburg Palace served as the primary summer recreational palace for the Bavarian Rulers. This Baroque palace which has now become one of the most important and iconic tourist destinations of the city was initially completed in 1675 but had gone through several spells of reconstruction and renovation. he palace consists of the Northern, Central and Southern Pavilions and is a masterful display of architectural prowess that strongly reflects the mentalities and regal nature of the Bavarian Royalty.

title: Beautiful Royal Palace
text: This is one of the largest and grandest palaces in Bavaria and is a must see if you are anywhere near Munich.  This palace has been the summer home to Holy Roman Emperors and was the birthplace for King Ludwig II (of Neuschwanstein Castle fame).  Throughout the palace is a collection of richly decorated walls and ceilings, expensive furnishings, tapestries and paintings.  Highlights include the "Gallery of Beauties" commissioned by King Ludwig, King Ludwig's stateroom/bedroom and the impressive banquet hall.  The Palace is surrounded by manicured gardens, fountains and waterways.  This palace is also famous for its famous carriage and porcelain museums.  Information on each exhibit is presented in both German and English.  The Palace is open April through mid-October from 9 AM to 6 PM and from mid-October to March from 9 AM to 4 PM.  Price of admission is 6 euros (5 euros reduced fare) for the Nymphenburg Palace and 4.5 euros each (3.5 euros reduced fare for the carriage and porcelain museums.  A combination ticket for all of this plus the smaller park palaces is 8.5 euros (6.5 euros reduced).  We took  tram #17 from the Munich Altstadt/Old town (Karlsplatz Station) to within a few blocks of the palace and it was a very easy to get to.  They are working on the tram line so the very last stop closest to the palace was shut down but they were running a bus for that short distance but it's just as easy to walk the few blocks

title: The inside was better than I expected!
text: From the photos I thought it'd be a bit too gaudy for my tastes, but we couldn't believe the style and detail from the ceilings down. There was a little less in the castle open to the public than I'd expected, but that worked perfectly for our short time frame. We explored the carriage and porcelain museum nearby, the carriages and sleighs being my personal favorite!The gardens were MUCH larger than I'd realized, and we only got to see a faction of what was there including the insides of two of the small buildings (a personal palace and a bathhouse). One of the workers said we shouldn't try to see everything in one day, and could use out ticket for several days, but we had to leave Germany the next morning. Between the statues, architecture, history, and the water foul, we absolutely loved our experience, even if we were sad it was so limited due to our time restrictions.A word of warning: My husband bought something from the local bakery before we walked onto the grounds. The geese instantly recognized the bag, and started to surround him. I don't know if most people know how aggressive geese can be, but I got worried and stood between him and the birds with my arms open wide, to block and scare them away. They didn't look very scared, just a little annoyed, and decided to leave him alone. Don't leave small children unattended with bread! The birds might be more persistent if they think they can get away with bread-theft.
