Для маленьких детей прямо внутри можно взять на время экскурсии коляску. Рассказ здесь сильно пересекается с историями, которые рассказывают в Нойшванштайн и Хоэшвангау. Так что для полного кругозора - рекомендовано.В целом, это дворец для тех, кто не хочет куда-то далеко из Мюнхена уезжать. Находится недалеко от центра города, легко можно добраться на общественном транспорте.

title: Superbe château
text: Accès depuis le centre avec le tram numéro 17. La résidence d’été de la famille Willelsbach est un petit joyau dans Munich même. Peu de salles à visiter à l’intérieur du château, mais visite très intéressante, ne pas hésiter à prendre l’audio guide très bien fait. Il faut absolument compléter la visite avec le magnifique parc et ses quatre pavillons, plus beaux les uns que les autres. Belle et longue balade à pied en perspective.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 비텔스바흐 가문의 여름별궁
text: 베르사유와 쇤부른에 뒤지지 않는 비텔스바흐의 여름별장입니다.온전히 하루를 투저할만큼 추천할만한 곳입니다.가든은 물론 성 내부의 미인의 방, 마차박물관 등 콤비티켓을 끊어 여기저기 둘러볼 것을 추천합니다.

title: Besichtigung
text: Gute Präsentation. Weitläufig.Schade, waren im Mai nur wenige Blumen gepflanzt.Interessante Geschichte.

title: Фигня
text: Так себе, погулять можно.Кафе вообще отвратительное.Голодными не посещайте.😀Если лхота походить и убить время , то самое то.

title: Worth a visit and reasonably priced.
text: An interesting enough place to visit but not a lot to see inside the palace. The gardens are magnificent and worth going for.

title: Неожиданно интересно
text: Проезжай на синем экскурсионном автобусе по Мюнхене, оказались около дворца Нимфенбург. Вышли на этой остановке и зависли на пол дня. Это было прекрасно. очень красивый дворец, аудиогид дате полную информацию о каждой комнате, было интересно. В билет входило посещение еще нескольких павильонов на территории парка, поэтому отправились на поиски . Парк чудесный, щебечут птички, плавают лебеди, гуляют олени, просто сказка. Особенно впечатлил музей карет - это грандиозное зрелище!

title: The garden is dpectacular
text: We spent too days here.  The palace is nice enough, but we found the garden with kits pavilions awesome.  Spent a full day enjoying them.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Large, beautiful palace grounds!
text: Another awesome European palace to visit, with plenty to do at the grounds, including seeing the gardens and the Amalienburg
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful Rooms and Gardens
text: A real MUST for any visitor to Munich - you can travel there by tram and walk around the gardens at any time (free of charge). The rooms are beautiful to look at and form a very useful introduction to the noble and royal families of Bavaria.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wunderschön erhaltene und gepflegte Park- und Schlossanlage
text: Für mich waren die beiden Besuche im Schlosspark von Nymphenburg die Highlights meines München-Besuchs: Ein riesiger, im englischen Landschaftsstil angelegter Garten mit herrlichen Panoramen, interessanten architektonischen Objekten (Monopteros, Badenburg, Pagodenburg usw), großen Teichen, lauschigen Kanälen und Brücken, herrlichen alten Bäumen und viele Kilometer Spazierwege... Wann auch immer Zeit ist sollte man einen Besuch hier unbedingt einplanen!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 広いです
text: バイエルン国王の夏の離宮です。離宮なのにとても広くて豪華絢爛です。ルートヴィヒ２世が愛用していた、馬車やそりが展示してある馬車博物館は必見です。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Romantik!!!
text: am Wasserfall im Schloßpark hat mir mein Mann den Heiratsantrag gemacht, danach sind wir ins Cafe Palmengarten und die Sache war geritzt

title: UN PALACIO PEQUEÑO PERO MUY MUY BONITO
text: residencia de la familia real.  restaurado con bonitos jardines.. LA VISITA OBLIGATORIA.. mejorará con Guia.. yo al menos así lo hice y me encantó.

title: Ausflug im Regen
text: Trotz starkem Regenfall war der Besuch des Schlosses Nymphenburg ein tolles Erlebnis. Die Parkanlagen sind sehr gepflegt (leider sind die Wege von Vogelkot übersät, sodass man aufpassen muss, nicht hineinzutreten). Das Schloss an sich ist sehr imposant, auch die Angestellten sind sehr freundlich und kompetent. Es ist auch bei Schlechtwetter als Alternativprogramm zu empfehlen - vor allem da nicht ein riesiger Besucherandrang herrscht,

title: Interesting
text: My daughter and I enjoyed our time here.  She really enjoyed the ornate bedrooms in the palace, while I particularly enjoyed the portraits, especially the "beauties".  We also visited the carriage museum, which is worth a look though I wish it also included some examples of the more ordinary versions of these historical conveyances.  We had a very nice lunch in the palm house, and would have enjoyed exploring the garden and surrounding park, however the weather was foul the day of our visit.

title: Beautiful garden
text: The garden was very nice and beautiful. Lot of space and trails to hang around. Castle was not so big and there's a lot more to see in Residenz for example
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beatiful palace and garden!
text: We thoroughly enjoyed the architecture of the building and the decors of each room.  Only thing we didn't like is how the rooms are not connected so it was a bit crowded to go inside and come out of each room.  Be sure to enjoy the garden, which is beautifully maintained.

title: München auf eine Faust
text: an einem schönen Tag im Oktober 2018 führte uns der Weg zum Schloß und Park Nymphenburg. Die  Anlage ist sehr weitläufig, schön, und der Park war sehr schön angelegt. Hin und wieder waren die Springbrunnen und Teiche versiegt, durch die anhaltende Trockenheit, aber es war trotzdem schön, durch die Anlage zu spazieren.

title: Beautiful
text: This place is a must see on a fine day. Truly spectacular is the only way to describe it.The gardens and lakes are amazing.

title: Relativ einfach , aber interessant
text: Nicht zum ersten mal da und immer wieder gerne. Keine großen Schätze, aber alleine die Sammlung von Frauenportrets ist schön
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Da favola
text: Abbiamo approfittato della bella giornata per fare un giro completo, visitando i padiglioni nel parco,immersi nella natura, fra animali selvatici e paesaggi stupendi. All'interno del castello si possono ammirare le bellezze della sala principale e altre stanze.La visita è piuttosto breve ma piacevole.Da non perdere il museo delle carrozze. Mi ha fatta sognare come una bambina!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Breathtaking gardens
text: We reached too late to enter the palace but our visit to the gardens Area was wonderful. Check out the beautiful swans and keep off the grass else you’ll get a gentle warning ...
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beeindruckendes Schloss
text: Einfach unglaublich! Toll gepflegter Park mit vielen historischen Eindrücken gepaart. Man kann hier sowohl Geschichte nachvollziehen als auch einfach entspannen. Toll erhaltene Gebäude und einfach beeindruckender Garten. Wenn man alles besichtigen will, braucht man sicher einen ganzen Tag!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nichts
text: Es ist von oben sehr schön anzuschauen, aber mehr nicht. Es lohnt sich nicht. Es ist immer ein weiter weg. Aber das können Sie vergessen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Schöner Spaziergang
text: Sehr gepflegter Schlossgarten. Lädt zum Spaziergang ein Das Schloss ist sehr schön.Man kann eine Ruhe geniesen.

title: すごくキレイだった。バイエルンチケットが有効です。
text: 宮殿へ向かう道から、自然の緑と宮殿の白やグレーが見えて、広くて大きい宮殿に圧倒されました。中に入ると大広間がすごくキレイで、シャンデリアや天井の絵画などが素晴らしくて、思わず声が出てしまったほどです。また、庭園がすごく広くて、噴水もあり緑もたくさんあり、天気も良かったため、散歩に絶好の日でした。昔の豪華な馬車やソリの展示もありました。バイエルンチケットが有効なので、レジデンツやノイシュバンシュタイン城へも行く方は購入した方がお得だと思います。

title: Take a half day to visit
text: I would highly recommend taking a half day to visit the palace and the surrounding area.   The palace grounds are very spacious and there is much to see.  The surroundings area has many high quality restaurants which are goid for lunch or dinner.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sommerresidenz
text: Die bayerischen Kurfürsten der Wittelsbacher  erbauten einst dieses wunderbare, großzügige Schloss. Besonders sehenswert ist der Festsaal im Mittleren Teil des Schlosses im sommerlichen Licht des späten Nachmittags und frühen Abends.

title: Absolut lohnenswert
text: Wir haben einen ganzen Tag in und ums Schloss verbracht, denn es gibt hier viel zu sehen. Im Schlossinnern empfiehlt es sich für die Erklärungen ein Audio Guide zu mieten. Im weitläufigen Park stehen 4 Parkburgen, deren Besichtigung sich ebenso lohnt wie das Kutschen- und Porzellanmuseum im Marstallgebäude.

title: Esplendoroso
text: Belíssimo palácio, não deixe de fazer essa visita! Para quem não quer visitar o interior do palácio, a entrada para os jardins é livre e vale muito a pena. Facilmente acessível de ônibus para quem se hospeda próximo ao centro.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nur der Park
text: Das Schloss haben wir uns geschenkt, der Park ist einen längeren Spaziergang wert. Wir sind bei den verschiedensten Anlaufpunkten gewesen. Insgesamt 3 h, sehr schöner Spaziergang.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: красивая резеденция
text: Помимо музеев, находящихся внутри дворца, впечатляет огромный пруд перед дворцом, на котором много лебедей, гусей и уток, а также большой красивый парк за ним.

title: Были в Петергофе, но нам все равно понравилось
text: Мы купили билет на все зоны 11,50 евро на человека и отдельно аудиогид 3,5 евро. Аудиогид действует только на зону при входе. Но мы не пожалели. Благодаря аудиогиду интерносно посмотреть внутренние убранства. Перед входом у кассы справа возьмите брошюру ( там есть карта и описание на англ). Пользуйтесь картой чтобы обойти все зоны.  В входной билет входит конюшня и форфоронвй зал ( слева от главного входа). Мы ни разу не пожалели что взяли все зоны. Каждое здание интересно оформлено и поражало ! При входе на билете ставят пометку, какую зону вы посетили. Смотрите карту и быстро соеринтируетесь какие зоны вам ещё доступны.Мы были в конце мая. Посещение внутренней територии было бесплатно ( по крайней мере свободный вход, никто не проверял). Но я бы советовала полный билет.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: На весь день
text: Посещение Нимфенбурга стоиит целого дня. Пройтись пешком по каналу, приближаясь к дворцу, потом посетить дворе и погулять по парку. Дворец очень красивый. Экспозиция весьма интересна. Отличный парк. Отличное место для выходного дня.

title: 漫步宁芬堡宫
text: 在Hotzel cafe休憩之后，走几步路就到了你I宁芬堡宫，除了凉凉的天气之外，这里的美景让人留连忘返，看到在湖边睡觉的天鹅🦢。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Hier geht man auf eine Zeitreise
text: Die wunderschön gelegene Schloss ist  ein absolutes Highlight das man unbedingt auf seiner Bayern Tour besuchen sollte. Wir waren schon das dritte mal hier, immer zu verschiedenen Jahreszeiten und es ist jedesmal auf eine andere Art interessant. Die angebotenen Führungen mit einem „Hör Guide“ ist jedes mal interessant und bietet einem immer wieder neue Erkenntnisse die man vorher evtl. nicht so wahr genommen hatte. Man entdeckt immer wieder neues und spannendes.Der Garten bietet so viele Facetten an  Reichtum von Pflanzen und verborgenen Orten. Hier und dort ein Kaffee oder ein schöner Ort zum Verweilen. Diesen Ort könnte man x- mal besuchen und man findet immer wieder schöne und ruhige stellen zum Verweilen. Was für ein Geschenk mitten in einer Stadt!!!!!

title: Massive Residences Of Old European Royalty
text: This place is a world class travel destination. If you can visit only one palace, this should be the one.Entrance to the palace grounds is free. The military parade ground is acres/hectares large and the formal gardens are beautiful.The palace tours cost and are well worth it. You pass through room after room of classic decor, art and furnishings. Use the recording phones for the tour. The very views out the windows are breathtaking.The palace is architecturally stunning on the outside. Carved figures, multiple windows, angled roofs, sweeping staircases.The tour through this is lengthy. Kids might be bored after awhile. Just sayin'.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Immer wieder schön
text: Immer wieder schön. Immer wieder einen Besuch wert. Nicht nur das Schloss, sondern auch die kleineren Bauten im Park. Der Park selbst lädt zu wunderschönen Spaziergängen ein.

title: 夏の離宮
text: ミュンヘン中央駅からＴＲＡＭ　で１５分広大な庭が広がり池には約６０羽の白鳥がゆっくりと人を怖がるでもなく餌を与える人もいない。別の小さい池にはカルガモが泳いでいた。残念ながら日頃は閑古鳥が鳴くという、城内見学はＥＡＳＴＥＲ　ＨＯＬＩＤＡＹでＴＩＣＫＥＴ売り場長蛇の列で断念。Ludwig2世が生まれたWittlsbach朝の夏の離宮。

title: Résidence d'été de style rococo du prince électeur Ferdinand Marie
text: Visite libre avec audio-guide en français de ce beau petit palais. La 'galerie des beautés' est la surprise du Roi Louis

title: A Must-Go
text: If you love nature, arts and history, this is a great place to visit. Must wear comfortable walking shoes for the place is so wide.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: beautiful!
text: so beautiful to walk around the Schloss and visit all the rooms. Bedrooms and chandeliers enchanting.

title: What a Place!!
text: The gardens are just beautiful and make wonderful photos.  The grounds are really big.  I only spent about an hour in the Palace as there are maybe 15 or so rooms that have been restored.  Audio guide was pretty good.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Una meraviglia incredibile!
text: Palazzo assolutamente non perdere: le stanze sono bellissime e proprio di fronte al Museo delle Porcellane si trova un'esposizione di carrozze meravigliosa!Il parco, poi, è il punto forte! Vi consiglio di prendervi l'intera giornata: i padiglioni bisogna assolutamente vederli, sono forse più belli delle stanze del palazzo!Il prezzo del biglietto ne vale assolutamente la pena. Se avete intenzione di visitare anche altri castelli in Baviera e il Residenz di Monaco vi consiglio di acquistare il biglietto cumulativo per i castelli bavaresi che costa 48 euro ed è valido per due persone.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Palacio en las afueras no tan afueras
text: Es una cercana y recomendable excursión que se hace en tranvía con una pocas estaciones de por medio desde la estación central. Estar atentos a las remodelaciones en distintas estaciones que pueden no tener acceso.Vale tomarse un tiempo para visitarlo, en su parte principal no tan así en los distintos puntos de interes dispersos por el parque
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Best garden
text: Be sure to visit the gardens - better then the English Garden. No ticket requiredCafe - not on map - near the palace in the garden.The palace itself was a little disappointing - buy a ticket giving access to the outlying buildings as well.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lindo Palácio
text: Palácio enorme, recomendo fazer a visita ao interior para conhecer a história e a arquitetura. Os jardins externos são muito bonitos.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Outstanding palace
text: Lots of history of German royalty.  Outstanding museum of horse-drawn royal coaches and royal sleighs.  Large outdoor gardens to walk through.  Also easy access with public transit.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nymphenburg
text: This was my favourite place to visit while visiting Munich and the one who whad a special vibe to it. I totally recommend visiting every part of it and enjoy a walk around it.

title: Limited Access
text: We were only allowed to see 8 rooms of the 400+ rooms.  Better to just spend time outside on the gardens which is free.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Grand Scale and sense of space
text: Impressive scale.  A good reminder of how much better off we are to not have the royals pumping money into such extravagances, but it is a great asset for the modern public.  Take the walk from here over to the botanic garden - amazing tulip display in April.

title: Meraviglia
text: Il posto è splendido. C’è il parcheggio vicino. Si può entrare a visitare l’interno del palazzo a pagamento o altrimenti fare un giro oltre l’edificio nel bellissimo parco con lago e sentieri annessi. Rilassante per trascorrere alcune ore serenamente. Lo consiglio

title: A must see to understand german history
text: Well organized tour which shows the highlights of the Bavarian history. A must see to understand the history of Bavaria and Germany

title: Mind boggling size
text: You enter from a very long road along a canal that was built to supply water to the palace. The complex is massive, with some of the buildings open to the public. Many people are content just to watch and feed the many swans on the grounds.

title: Absolutely Stunning
text: Get here early, because there's a LOT to explore.  The palace is absolutely beautiful and filled with the best in art, architecture, history and opulence.  The gardens behind the palace are vast and extremely peaceful to stroll through.  My wife and I had a wonderful time there...just wish we would've arrived a little earlier so we had more time to explore.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Uma boa visita
text: Um belo castelo. Os jardins valem a visita (que é gratuita). O interior é mais ou menos.Vale a pena gastar algumas horas caminhando e relaxando pelos jardins. Há também um restaurante e banheiro para quem quiser. A entrada no jardim é livre.

title: Grandioso e com belos jardins
text: Vale como parada para fotografias e, se tiver tempo, fazer uma visita interna, embora os móveis sejam de época mas não os originais do palácio.

title: Pałac
text: Ogromny obiekt, super pałac i teren który do niego należy. Duża ilość atrakcji i wspaniały park. Na zwiedzenie posiadłości i terenu potrzeba cały dzień. Bardzo przyjemnie można spędzić czas na spacerze i relaksie z naturą. Mnóstwo ścieżek wśród drzew, stawu i strumyków. Można również zatrzymać się w restauracji. Będąc w Monachium trzeba odwiedzić.

title: Magnifique jardin
text: Magnifique jardin avec des jets d'eau et la rivière. Le bâtiment grandiose embellit l’atmosphère paradisiaque du jardin. N'oubliez pas de faire une pause dans le café pour goûter une bonne bière.

title: 日本語レンタルガイド
text: 案内さんが引き連れての観光よりも、音声ガイドはより詳細で、全部聴くと半日ぐらい。でも上手くできていて、3.5€はケチらないことです。天気も良く、ランニングする人も多いようです。フラットなコースで誰もが楽しんでる様子が良くわかります。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful Garden
text: A must visit. The gardens are extremely beautiful. The river canal/stream I would say just adds to the beauty of this place. You can also take a boat tour or take stroll in the gardens for hours. You will not regret it. The best way to cover it is take a Hop on Hop off bus the Red one and it shall take you this as well as other great places.

title: お庭が美しい
text: 天候が悪い中、晴れた日があり行きました。宮殿も素晴らしいのですが、お庭が気に行って2時間くらいお散歩しました。白鳥やアヒル、野生のリスもいました。また子鹿にも遭遇し、橋の向こうから走ってきて、私の横を猛スピードで走り去っていきました！ミュンヘン中心部から20分程度でいけます。因みに17番のトラムは途中工事中で、途中駅まで行ったあと、バスに乗り換えて行きました。旅行者にはちょっとわかりづらいかもしれませんが、駅での表示と英語のアナウンスがあったので すぐにわかりました。

title: Fuori dalle solite rotte a Monaco
text: Bella residenza reale estiva. Bello il giro nell'ampio parco con cigni e papere e altri padiglioni. Collezione spettacolare di carrozze e slitte reali
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Peccato solo per la pioggia
text: Maestosa residenza reale attorniata da parco con altri palazzi minori visitabili.Con il tempo come amico si possono ammirare stagni e corsi d'acqua oltre ai mille fiori ben curati.Mostre anche di ceramiche e delle sfarzose carrozze.11 euro ben spesi
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Una visita imprescindible
text: Un lugar necesario de visitar en Munich y de dedicarle toda una mañana pues tiene varias zonas que visitar así como un parque muy agradable para dar un paseo. Importante tomarse uno su tiempo.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: It is just beautiful, relaxing, tranquil.
text: This was our final day of a 16 day holiday abroad, and I could not have wished for a better place to visit.  We took our time, were relaxed, watched people jogging or families spending time with their young children.  There are many benches and other places for quiet retreats.  Additionally, to visit the gardens is free of charge.

title: Remarkable museum
text: In our view, this is a must-see museum that really captures how royalty and the aristocracy lived in the past, all the excesses included.  The grounds are beautiful and the audio guide was excellent and definitely worth the extra 3 Euros.  Even though it's a bit of a trip to get there, you can easily spend the whole day enjoying this tourist site.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bello
text: Castello un pò in periferia imponente con bellissimo parco con fiumi e laghetti. Interno bellissimo e che merita lunga visita

title: Gross und wunderschön
text: Wunderschöner Garten geeignet für amouröses Rendezvous als Paar. Auch für Einzelpersonen, Familien und/oder Gruppen jeglicher Form fürs Picknicken, Sporttreiben (joggen, Nordingwalking), Schnitzeljagd und Flanieren optimal.Es gibt die Möglichkeit ein im Haus Museum zu besuchen oder eine Gondelfahrt zu buchen. Der Schloss ist sehr gross und schön. Möchte man dem Alltag entfliehen, ist man da richtig.

title: Imperdibile!
text: Da dedicargli almeno una mezza giornata per potersi godere non solo gli spettacolari interni, ma tutto il parco circostante, con le costruzioni disseminate qui e là sulle sponde dei laghetti e che sono incredibilmente affascinanti.Per questo consiglio il biglietto cumulativo con tutte le attrazioni comprese, incluso anche il Museo delle carrozze, peculiare nel suo genere

title: Tolle Kulisse und Geschichte
text: Der Besuch des Schlosses war für mich auf der einen Seite hochinteressant schön anzusehen und faszinierend aus geschichtlicher Perspektive. Was mich allerdings wieder stört ist das dieses Stück Geschichte komplett kommerziell ausgeschlachtet wird und der Massentourismus Zustimmung und das Ambiente etwas erdrücken.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Toccata e fuga, solo esterni
text: Vale la pena andare anche solo un'ora per passeggiare nei giardini esterni e vedere questi palazzi meravigliosi. Moltissimi  parcheggi gratuiti, comodissimo per una toccata e fuga.

text: Schitterend paleis met enorme tuin we zijn niet binnen geweest ivm tijd gebrek.Doen we een volgende bezoek echt de moeite waard om te bezoeken.Ligt net buiten München in rustig deel erg groen.Doet een beetje denken aan Versailles qua idee.

title: Good Visit
text: I took the tram from downtown Munich to the palace.  There is construction so the tram stopped early and you either change to a bus or walk to the palace.  The walk is about a mile or so.  The palace had an audio guide that explains things in more details.  The palace is nice and interesting, especially if you have not been to many palaces in Europe.  They have nice gardens to walk in good weather.  It is not a necessary visit if you have seen other palaces.

text: Das Schloss Nymphenburg und insbesondere die Gartenanlage ist sehenswert und schön zum flanieren. Die Anlage ist unglaublich schön und gut gepflegt.

title: Pretty

It looks a lot like Schonnbrun palace in Vienna but much smaller. I don't think is a "must see" place in Munich. The ticket is 6 euro/ adult.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A romantic "must-do" for Munich visitors! Get your top instagram shot in the castle garden
text: Nymphenburg castle is a must-do for every Munich visitor. It's the most famous castle in the Munich area and located near the city center within a great park. The castle is easy reachable in 10 minutes with the tram line 17 from Munich Main Station (direction Romanplatz).Here you can enjoy a walk through a romantic garden of a different time. Castle Nymphenburg used to be the summer residence of Max Emanuel, who was born in 1662. He resided in the castle with his wife Henriette and reigned from 1680-1726. You can visit the castle from outside and the park for free. If you want to take a tour through the inside of the castle, the admission is 6 EUR for adults. The park is very popular for wedding photos as it offers a huge amount of great photo locations. Look for the professional photo artists with the wedding couples and you easily find the best spot for your instagram shots.

title: Munich visit
text: A must visit.  Buy the tickets to visit the other buildings outside the palace, it is worth it.  A lot of things to see with a fair amount of walking.

title: Ludwig 2. Schoenheitsgalerie.

Dans les jardins il ne faut pas oublier de visiter différents pavillons dont celui de la Pagode (de toute beauté). Il est très agréable de prendre le lunch dans la maison des palmiers. Il y a de quoi passer un ebelle demi-journée

title: Meraviglioso complesso in stile barocco
text: Di tanti luoghi visitati a Monaco,nei miei due soggiorni il loco,quello che piú mi ha entusiasmata é stato questo bellissimo castello,un tempo residenza estiva dei  re Bavaresi.Il castello é dislocato rispetto al centro cittá e pertanto l'ho raggiunto con il bus turistico rosso a due piani ma ricordo benissimo che dalla stazione centrale parte anche i tram 17 che si ferma proprio lì vicino..É l'unico castello visitato in Baviera dove ci é stato possibile scattare foto anche all'interno.Ospita saloni meravigliosi,opere d'arte stupende come la "Galleria delle bellezze  di Baviera",con i ritratti delle dame preferite di Re Ludovico I e la stanza dove nacque Ludovico II di Baviera,il Re Pazzo che fece costruire il meraviglioso castello di Neuschwastein,a FussenL'immenso parco ospita attrazioni come il Museo delle Carrozze e i padiglioni.Questi ultimi sono stupendi,in particolare il padiglione di caccia Amalienbourg,con la meravigliosa sala degli specchi e il Pagodenburg, suddiviso in due piani e con porcellane di Delft.Nel parco vi sono anche due laghetti molto scenografici.La visita completa richiede un'intera mattinata e un biglietto combinato che  includa la visita al castello e ai padiglioni.Opzione disponibile solo da Aprile a meta Ottobre,per ovvii motivi meteorologici.La differenza di prezzo é data proprio da ció che si intende visitare.I ragazzi fino ai 18 anni non pagano.Consiglio assolutamente questa visita, soprattutto in una splendida giornata di sole,come quella che ho trovato io durante le vacanze Pasquali.

title: residenza molto bella
text: il castello si trova a ovest del centro di Monaco e si raggiunge col tram 16 o 17 (che ha proprio la fermata vicino al castello). il catsello è molto grande ma voi visiterete solo la parte centrale del complesso, le aree laterali sono escluse dalla visita. se visitate solo questa parte del castello il biglietto costa 6 euro; nel caso in cui vogliate visitare anche le strutture presenti nel grande parco posteriore all'ingresso allora ci sarà un biglietto cumulativo di 11,5 euro. il giro del parco va fatto completamente perché è davvero bello e potrete trovare anche riposo lungo i percorsi sedendovi su una delle numerose panchine presenti, oppure vi potrete stendere sui bei prati verdi. davvero bellissimo complesso. se riuscite visitatelo la mattina presto e non nel fine settimana, avrete modo di essere un poco più tranquilli...

title: Bel castello
text: Siamo stati con la famiglia a vedere questo castello in una giornata fredda e piovosa d'aprile per cui non abbiamo potuto apprezzare l'incantevole parco che lo circonda. Il castello ha una bellissima facciata e ci è piaciuto moltissimo il salone principale mentre le altre stanze erano meno interessanti.

title: Дворец
text: Чисто и аккуратно. Уделите посещению не менее 2-х часов. Очень красиво, масштабно, аккуратно. Если идти на долго, то купить там еду сложно, лучше брать с собой. Экскурсия по замку возможна с русским аудиогидом. Музей карет заслуживает отдельного внимания. Есть красивый парк по которому можно погулять.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un ensemble impressionnant
text: Très vaste ensemble de bâtiments mais la visite du pavillon principal est relativement rapide. Elle permet de se faire une idée précise de ce qu’était la vie de château au temps de la splendeur très baroque de la Maison Wittelsbach.Par une belle journée de printemps, nous avons profité du magnifique parc où les cygnes, canards et autres oies cendrées sont comme chez eux dans les nombreux bassins. Le "Schlosscafe im Palmenhaus" tout proche permet de se restaurer tout en profitant pleinement de ce cadre verdoyant et bucolique.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Una meta da non perdere!
text: Siamo stati il giorno di Pasquetta al castello di Nymphenburg. Questa meraviglia è ottimamente collegata al centro di Monaco e si raggiunge in poco tempo utilizzando il tram.Si tratta della residenza estiva della famiglia Wittelsbach ed è costituito dal castello e dal suo grande giardino. Entrambi possono essere visitati. Il giardino è un’oasi di pace e tranquillità ricco di boschi, prati, laghi e torrenti oltre al maestoso canale centrale e alle sue fontane. Disseminati nel bosco si trovano dei piccoli palazzi ognuno dotato di caratteristiche diverse e originali.Il palazzo, nella sua maestosa sobrietà, racchiude sale incantevoli ricche di affreschi. Abbiamo approfittato dell’audioguida per approfondire la conoscenza del complesso.Per finire, molto interessante è la collezione delle carrozze e delle ceramiche.Se ci si trova a Monaco è una meta da non perdere.

title: Bellissimo
text: Castello meraviglioso con un giardino spettacolare. C'è il museo delle carrozze inoltre che è bellissimo. A differenza del Deutsche museum è molto più organizzato con audioguide in tutte le lingue. Poi il giardino è molto bello. Ed in più la comodità di poter parcheggiare gratuitamente vicino all'ingresso non ha prezzo.

title: Beautiful
text: Well worth visit you  an get the open bus tours which is good as you can see around would recommend this

title: Meraviglioso
text: Siamo stati in questo paradiso che È parte del patrimonio culturale lasciato dalla famiglia Wittelsbach e soprattutto dal mitico re Ludvig Secondo di Baviera. Residenza estiva dei reali, ben conservato e nell’ottica di visitare ciò che è stato dei reali bavaresi, merita. Consiglio vivamente l’audioguida e soprattutto prima di recarsi in questa ennesima meraviglia della predetta famiglia reale, consiglio di guardare un documentario sulla vita del re Ludwig secondo di Baviera, se si ha più tempo di leggere il libro della sua vita scritto da Greg King. In questo modo sarete più affascinanti nella visita. Consiglio vivamente di acquistare il biglietto completo per visitare oltre al Castello anche le carrozze, le ceramiche e i casali sparsi nel meravigliosissimo parco da percorrere in una passeggiata rilassante e pacifica.

title: Riesige Anlage mit besonderem Charme
text: ... weitläufige Parkanlage mit gut beschilderten Wegen führen den Schlossbesucher zu weiteren Sehenswürdigkeiten. Man wandelt sowohl sonnig wie auch schattig. Es gibt zahlreiche Möglichkeiten sich aus zu ruhen. Bei schönem Wetter sind viele Leute unterwegs, es verläuft sich aber gut, gerade an Stellen die etwas abgelegen vom Hauptschloss sind.Allg. ist Schloss Nymphenburg ein stark frequentierter Hotspot der guten Service bietet und auch bei Ansturm keine langen Wartezeiten entstehen lässt. Der Eintrittspreis ist gerechtfertigt und okay !Die Ausstellungen sind ansprechend und auch barrierefrei. Die Schlossanlage samt Park ist sehr gut mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreichbar. Zudem befindet sich auf dem Parkgelände ein Café sowie ein Kisok. Um alles in Ruhe zu erkunden sollte viel Zeit eingeplant werden.

Consiglio L’utilizzo dell’ audioguida per poter approfondire al meglio la visita  degli appartamenti. I recommend visiting this castle and its gardens to all tourists. title: Beautiful summer residence
text: Built in 1664 and completed in 1675, Nymphenburg palace was the main summer residence of the former rulers of Bavaria of the House of Wittelsbach. Ludwig II of Bavaria was born there in one of its rooms.Outsides are beautiful with its 200 hectares where are hidden few garden pavillons.Audio guide is well performed but only explains the insides. Royal appartements are beautiful, with particularly a lots of painting.There is a lots of people so I would recommend to come early in the day. We came late in the morning around 10 am and it was still okay.

title: Huge Palace
text: This palace is just huge with enormous grounds. The main building stretches over 400m wide and the garden areas front and back stretch for over 1 km.It suffers badly from overcrowding with many tour buses and groups arriving at the same time. I suggest going very early to try and miss the crowds.On the left hand side is the Marstall museum which houses all the royal carriages and sleighs. They are so ornate and covered in gold.The main entrance leads to the royal chambers. Due to the crowds we got out of there as fast as we could. The rooms are exactly the same as The Residenz, the city palace, which is far easier to move around in and has more rooms open to the public.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Worth going
text: I honestly can’t remember if I’d been to Nymphenburg Palace during my last 2 trips to Munich. Anyway I went there today and had an very enjoyable time. The palace and the rooms inside were beautiful. So were the other pavilions, especially Amalienburg. The weather couldn’t be better (all sun and blue sky with no cloud). So I could walk very freely in the huge garden. You need 3 hours at least for a leisurely visit.

title: Lunch with friends
text: Great service food atmosphere, thank you. Busy lunchtime but found a table quickly. Service was prompt and engaging waiter who was keen to give us options. Price was reasonable and great venue too.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: One of the Munich highlights
text: The castle of Nymphenburg lies in the west of Munich. It builds together with the castle park Nymphenburg and the small castles in the park one unit. it is one of the great royal castles in Europe and its span exceeds with 632 meters (north-south-axis) even the palace of Versailes. The construction was started 1664 and in 1679 the castle was almost completed in its first form. During the reign of Elector Max Emanuel (1680-1726)Nymphenburg Palace was given its present dimension. One of the attractions in the interior of the castle are the beauty gallery of King Ludwig I and the birth room of King Ludwig II of Bavaria ( builder of the famous castles ) who was born there on August 25, 1845. This location is a must do if you stay in Munich.

title: Mooi paleis met zeer grote tuin.
text: Schloss Nymphenburg entree is met een combiticket 11,50 euro. In het paleis mogen geen tassen en rugzakken mee. In het park heb je kans een hert te zien, naast de vele zwanen.Met het combiticket heb je ook toegang tot het Marstall museum. Hierin zijn alle koetsen te bewonderen.

title: Wonderful Palace on Extensive Grounds
text: The palace is beautiful and the grounds are extensive. Much time can be spent wandering through this attraction. There was some restoration work going on inside the palace while we were there so that detracted from some of the rooms. Some of the rooms contain original period furniture. We did find it difficult to find parking there as well. Our GPS didn't like the streets we were supposed to turn on so we drove by the palace a few times before realizing which street we could park on. Parking near the palace is free.

title: Giardini incantevoli
text: Consiglio una visita a questi magnifici giardini. Una vera meraviglia. Consiglio di perderci almeno una mattinata intera, se non addirittura una giornata.

title: Царство лебедей
text: Дворец Нимф (или Нимфенбург) - дворцовый комплекс, который основан в 1664 году и занимает 200 гектаров. На территории его парка многочисленные водоемы и каналы, гроты, купальни, охотничий домик, фарфоровая мануфактура (изделия которой выставлены в музеях дворца), фонтан, античные статуи и многочисленные павильоны. Каналы Нимфенбурга - это царство лебедей, здесь их очень много. Очень приятное место для прогулок. Единственное, некоторые павильоны разрушены и не восстановлены.Работает ежедневно летом с 9:00 до 18:00; с 16 октября по 31 марта с 10:00 до 16:00. Вход - 9-11,50 евро. Мы доехали сюда на трамвае №17 от Центрального вокзала.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Superbe château
text: prendre le tram 17 jusqu'au château. Très beau palais à visiter ainsi que le parc. Le musée des carrosses est très intéressant.

title: Little piece of history
text: My favourite film when I was a child was Sisi from 1955, and visiting the palace brought back those memories. It's beautiful but the the visiting areas very reduced, a very quick tour, my advice if you have time to spare pick the entrance ticket that allows you to visit the annexes and garage/stables.

title: Prévoir la journée
text: Un incontournable en étant en Bavière que de faire l'un de ses châteaux. Le château est lui-même magnifique mais le parc réserve encore plus de surprises. Le mieux est de prendre une Kombikarte pour le château, les 3 petits châteaux dans le parc ainsi que l'ermitage et le musée. À proximité immédiate de Nymphenburg se trouve également un musée d'histoire naturelle et un jardin botanique.

One can enjoy the  beautiful gardens without cost, the entrance on your left, facing the castle   The interior of the huge castle is well worth a visit.  It is a simple tram ride from downtown Munich.

title: Nymphenburg Palace and grounds.
text: What an amazing place to discover riding a push bike around Munich. I found the water channel that leads to it and followed that to the Palace. Its true what they say, everything is bigger in Germany. A grand building and gardens to go with it.

title: Nymphenburg palace tour
text: We enjoyed this tour. It provided us with an understanding of the life style of people of royalty at the time. Personal articles and artifacts were all on display. The size of the palace and grounds is astounding. Be prepared to walk a lot if you want to see everything. Well worth seeing.

title: Beautiful

title: Beautiful Palace
text: Lovely day spent here, gorgeous grounds, beautiful palace (confusing - could really be doing with more directional signs) rude staff who shouted at us because my phone automatically turned flash on.  Really?  Could you not just approach us in a civil way? We did apologise but he made us feel so embarrassed we soon left. Love King Ludwig, so this was a great place to visit.  Visited the Stables - a must see! absolutely stunning pieces of work in there.  Loved the gallery of beauties too.  Good day spent here, but staff really unpleasant.

text: Spend your time in the palace and skip the chapel.   The statues are mostly covered up in the off season.  Skip the grand cascade as it’s a long walk and not worth it in the off season, as it’s turned off.  They won’t tell you this when you buy tickets but gladly take your money.

text: The grounds were somewhat underwhelming, without flowers, which could be because of the early season, or even topiaries or hedges. The gift shop is nice, though, with clesn restrooms.
